de-covert_operatives.title: Covert Operatives
de-covert_operatives.def: The unit gains Skirmisher, Hard Target(1).

de-altar_of_nabh.title: Altar of Nabh
de-altar_of_nabh.def:
The model gains Attached, Exclusive(Height 1), Frenzy, Fury, , War Platform, Unruly.
Model parts with Elf in friendly units within 12" of the Altar of Nabh gain Fury.

de-altar_of_tila.title: Altar of Tila
de-altar_of_tila.def:
The model’s Charge Speed and Mobility are always 0".
In addition, it gains Channel(2), Emplacement, Solitary, Fearless, Stubborn, Unstable.
When another friendly unit within 18" of the model suffers one or more unsaved wounds from an enemy attack, the Altar of Tila may cause 3 hits with Str 4, AP 2 and, Unmodifiable towards the enemy unit that caused the wounds. This effect can only be used once per Phase.

de-altar_of_yema.title: Altar of Yema
de-altar_of_yema.def:
The model gains Attached, War Platform, Exclusive(Height 1), and a single Attendant model part gains Petrifying Stare.
Whenever a friendly unit within 12" of the Altar of Yema initiates any kind of move (see Definition and Terminology chapter in the Reference Handbook), the unit gains +1 Mobility and Devastating Charge(Strider). Duration: End of Turn.

de-temple_acolytes.title: Temple Acolytes
de-temple_acolytes.def: The Dread Acolyte model part gains Artistry of Death, Paired Weapons and Temple.

de-warlock_acolytes.title: Warlock Acolytes
de-warlock_acolytes.def:
The unit gains Wizard Conclave(2), Irresistible Will.
The Dread Acolyte model parts gains Warlock.
The unit selects its spells from:

de-academy_commander.title: Academy Commander
de-academy_commander.def:
The model part gains Academy.
Model parts with Academy in the model’s unit gain Artistry of Death.

de-beastmaster.title: Beastmaster
de-beastmaster.def:
The model part gains Slaver.
Apply the following effects to units within range of this model’s Commanding Presence (friend or foe):
  • Friendly units containing Beast: Courage Tests gain Minimised.
  • Friendly units: rolls for the number of hits from Stomp Attack gain Maximised.
  • Enemy units: rolls for the number of hits from Stomp Attack gain Minimised.

de-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
de-meeting_of_minds.def: The model gains Scent of Blood and treats all friendly models with Beast as Insignificant.

de-coastal_predator.title: Coastal Predator
de-coastal_predator.def: The model gains Hard Target(1) while in contact with a Water Terrain.

de-colossal_kraken.title: Colossal Kraken
de-colossal_kraken.def: The model’s base size is changed to 100×150 mm, the number of its HP is set to 8, and it gains 2 additional Lashmasters.

de-extraordinary_specimen.title: Extraordinary Specimen
de-extraordinary_specimen.def: The Manticore gains Stomp Attack(D3) and its base size is changed to 50×100 mm.

de-under_the_cover_of_mists.title: Under the Cover of Mists
de-under_the_cover_of_mists.def:
Enemy units within 8" of one or more Mist Leviathans suffer -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.
In addition, during the first Game Turn, all models in friendly units containing Height 1 within 8" of one or more Mist Leviathans gain Hard Target(1).

de-dancers_of_yema.title: Dancers of Yema
de-dancers_of_yema.def:
The model gains Aegis(5+, against Melee Attacks), First Strike(+1 Att),Elven Finesse, Weapon Master.
It also gains Shield, Great Weapon, Halberd.

de-daeb_warfare.title: Daeb Warfare
de-daeb_warfare.def:
When a unit containing Daeb Warfare is part of a Combined Charge, its Charge Range rolls gain Maximised.
When multiple units containing Daeb Warfare are Engaged in the same Combined Combat, each of these units gains First Strike(Resolute(1)).

de-irresistible_will.title: Irresistible Will
de-irresistible_will.def: When casting a Learned spell, any Dispelling Roll made against the Casting Roll suffers a -1 modifier.

de-scent_of_blood.title: Scent of Blood
de-scent_of_blood.def: Charge Range rolls made by units entirely with Scent of Blood gain Maximised, if the target of the Charge contains a Health Pool that has fewer Health Points than its starting value.

de-krakens_hide.title: Kraken’s Hide
de-krakens_hide.def: The wearer gains +1 Armour and Strider(Water Terrain).

de-artistry_of_death.title: Artistry of Death
de-artistry_of_death.def: Standard Melee Attacks gain +1 to wound.

de-petrifying_stare.title: Petrifying Stare
de-petrifying_stare.def: At the model part’s Agility Step, each enemy unit in contact with it suffers 2 hits that are set to-wound on 5+, always have AP 10, and Magical Attacks.

de-repeater_crossbow.title: Repeater Crossbow
de-repeater_crossbow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Repeater CrossbowX18"231**Attacks made at Long Range have their AP set to 0.

de-repeater_handbow.title: Repeater Handbow
de-repeater_handbow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Repeater HandbowX12"231*Quick to Fire,Accurate,Stand and Shoot
*Attacks made at Long Range have their AP set to 0.

de-harpoon_launcher.title: Harpoon Launcher
de-harpoon_launcher.def:
Units that suffer one or more hits from this weapon lose Swiftstride, until the start of the Active Player’s next Turn, and cannot gain it in any way.

Harpoon Launcher - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Harpoon Launcher318"363Accurate, Quick to Fire, Harpoon Launcher


Harpoon Launcher

Units that suffer one or more hits from this weapon lose Swiftstride, until the start of the Active Player’s next Turn, and cannot gain it in any way.

de-daeb_bolt_thrower.title: Daeb Bolt Thrower
de-daeb_bolt_thrower.def:
-

Range 24", Shots 8, Str 5, AP 2.
Note that the model can move and shoot.

Daeb Bolt Thrower - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Daeb Bolt Thrower324"852 -

Range 24", Shots 8, Str 5, AP 2.
Note that the model can move and shoot.

de-curse_of_the_phantom_queen.title: Curse of the Phantom Queen
de-curse_of_the_phantom_queen.def:
Attacks made by the target suffer -1 AP.
Attacks made against the target gain +1 AP.
Attacks from spells are not affected.

de-transcendence.title: Transcendence
de-transcendence.def: For each HP loss the wielder inflicts with this weapon on enemy models, it gains +1 Str and +1 AP, up to a maximum of +2 each, with Duration: Permanent.

de-mastery_of_slaughter.title: Mastery of Slaughter
de-mastery_of_slaughter.def:
+1 Str, +1 AP.

If the wielder causes one or more HP loss with this weapon, then all attacks made by Rank-and-File models in its unit gain +1 to hit. Duration: Round of Combat.

de-seal_of_the_republic.title: Seal of the Republic
de-seal_of_the_republic.def: For each HP loss the wearer inflicts with Standard Melee Attacks on enemy models, it gains +1 Armour, with Duration: Permanent.

de-moithirs_mirror.title: Moithir’s Mirror
de-moithirs_mirror.def:
The bearer gains Aegis(5+, against Melee Attacks). If one or more Melee Attacks are allocated against the bearer, it gains Grind Attack(3, Str 4, AP 2, Magical Attacks, Unmodifiable), with duration: Round of Combat.
This Grind Attack is always resolved with Agi 0.
(Note that Attacks made at Agi step 0 can trigger this effect.)

de-beastmasters_vial.title: Beastmaster’s Vial
de-beastmasters_vial.def: May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. One friendly unit entirely with Beast within 12" of the bearer gains Dying Blow. Duration: End of Combat.

de-ceinrans_scales.title: Ceinran’s Scales
de-ceinrans_scales.def: The bearer can cast Whispers of the Veil (Evocation) as a Bound Spell(3+).

de-ring_of_the_obsidian_thrones.title: Ring of the Obsidian Thrones
de-ring_of_the_obsidian_thrones.def: Unless the wearer is Shaken, Break Tests and Panic Tests taken by friendly units within 6" of the wearer gain Minimised.

de-banner_of_urlain.title: Banner of Urlain
de-banner_of_urlain.def:
Exclusive(Captain, Silent Assassin). The unit’s maximum size is changed to 15 models for units entirely with Height 1, and to 6 models for units entirely with Height 2.
Rank-and-File model parts with Elf in the bearer’s unit gain Devastating Charge(+1 Att).

de-eye_of_the_gorgon.title: Eye of the Gorgon
de-eye_of_the_gorgon.def:
The bearer’s unit gains Horror.
When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, nominate one Rank-and-File model part, or a model part on the bearer’s model, in the Front Rank of the bearer’s unit; the nominated model part gains Petrifying Stare.

de-caedhrens_pennon.title: Caedhren’s Pennon
de-caedhrens_pennon.def: While the bearer’s unit is part of a Combined Charge, that unit, as well as all other units that are Charging the same target, must reroll failed Charge Range rolls, and gain Devastating Charge(Hard Target(1)).

ong-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
ong-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Brood Rivalry, Unruly, and Orc.

ong-big_brother.title: Big Brother
ong-big_brother.def: The model’s HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and the roll for the number of hits it does with its Stomp Attack is Maximised.

ong-giant_club.title: Giant Club
ong-giant_club.def:
- Melee Weapon

+1 Str, +1 AP.

+1 Str, +1 AP.

ong-armed_to_the_teeth.title: Armed to the Teeth
ong-armed_to_the_teeth.def:
- Melee Weapon

The model gains Weapon Master and its Armour value is set to 2.
At the start of each Round of Combat that the model is fighting, if the model is within 12" of one or more friendly models that are equipped with a Great Weapon, Paired Weapons, and/or Shield, the model gains the corresponding equipment, with Duration: Round of Combat .

The model gains Weapon Master and its Armour value is set to 2.
At the start of each Round of Combat that the model is fighting, if the model is within 12" of one or more friendly models that are equipped with a Great Weapon, Paired Weapons, and/or Shield, the model gains the corresponding equipment, with Duration: Round of Combat .

ong-gnasher_dashers.title: Gnasher Dashers
ong-gnasher_dashers.def: The model gains Fly, Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Skirmisher, Extra Support(2).

ong-git_launcher.title: Git Launcher
ong-git_launcher.def:
A unit hit by a Git Launcher suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4 and AP 2.
On a to-hit roll of ‘6’, you may instead, place a Mad Git within 3" of the target and more than 1" away from any Impassable Terrain and other units, following the rules for Summoned Units.

ong-skewerer.title: Skewerer
ong-skewerer.def: The model’s base size is changed to 60×60 mm.

ong-goblin_gardens.title: Goblin Gardens
ong-goblin_gardens.def:
During Pre-game Selections, you may choose any Terrain (X) from: Field, Forest, Ruins, Water Terrain.
All Terrain Features following the rules for X they are Dangerous Terrain(6+) instead of any other instance of Dangerous Terrain.
In addition, friendly models with Goblin gain Strider(X).

ong-beastie_whisperer.title: Beastie Whisperer
ong-beastie_whisperer.def: Immediately before choosing a unit to join using the Hidden rule, the model may gain a Beastie mount without any upgrade for free. If the model joins a unit with at least one Rank-and-File model with Creepy-Crawlies, its mount gains Creepy-Crawlies, too.

ong-headhunter.title: Headhunter
ong-headhunter.def: The model part with Goblin gains March and Shoot, Poison Attacks (Melee and Shooting), and gains Throwing Weapons (4+) with Shots 3.

ong-mauler.title: Mauler
ong-mauler.def: The model part with Goblin gains Fury,First Strike(Hatred), and gains a Great Weapon.

ong-creepers.title: Creepers
ong-creepers.def: The model gains Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Scout, Skirmisher, Strider.

ong-green_tide.title: Green Tide
ong-green_tide.def: To-wound rolls of ‘1’ with Melee Attacks from friendly units within 8" must be rerolled.

ong-symbol_of_the_warborn_alliance.title: Symbol of the Warborn Alliance
ong-symbol_of_the_warborn_alliance.def:
The model can cast Guile and Fury (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell(5+).
Each time the model attempts to cast that Bound Spell, the owner may freely choose which version to cast.

ong-immense_bulk.title: Immense Bulk
ong-immense_bulk.def: HP set to 8, base size changed to 100×150 mm, and number of Rider model parts set to 8.

ong-surprise.title: Surprise
ong-surprise.def:
The model cannot be Deployed normally.
Instead, at the start of any Player Turn, the owner may choose a friendly non-Shaken Unengaged unit of Goblin Rabble or Gogtuk Neophytes :
Deploy the model with Surprise within 3" of the chosen unit and more than 1" away from any Impassable Terrain and other units.
If the model is not Deployed by the end of Game Turn 4, it is removed as a casualty.

ong-huntsman_spider.title: Huntsman Spider
ong-huntsman_spider.def: The model gains Creepy-Crawlies, and its base size is changed to 50×50 mm.

ong-troll_toll.title: Troll Toll
ong-troll_toll.def:
- Attack Attribute

For each Regeneration Save the model with this rule fails against an enemy Melee Attack, it may immediately perform a Standard Melee Attack towards the unit that caused the wound, before any casualties are removed.
This attack is allocated onto the attacking model’s Health Pool, and is not taken into account when determining the amount of attacks the model with Troll Toll can make due to Restricted Attacks.

For each Regeneration Save the model with this rule fails against an enemy Melee Attack, it may immediately perform a Standard Melee Attack towards the unit that caused the wound, before any casualties are removed.
This attack is allocated onto the attacking model’s Health Pool, and is not taken into account when determining the amount of attacks the model with Troll Toll can make due to Restricted Attacks.

ong-cave_troll.title: Cave Troll
ong-cave_troll.def: The model’s Armour value is set to 3, and it gains Strider(Ruins).

ong-big_wing.title: Big Wing
ong-big_wing.def: The model gains Stomp Attack(D3+1), and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm.

ong-tribe_leader.title: Tribe Leader
ong-tribe_leader.def:
If the General is a Tribe Leader, apply the following changes to Army List creation:


  • Max. 10% of the Army Points may be spent on units entirely with Goblin.

  • The Rarity and Duplication Limits Max. X items/army (i.e. max. X units/army, max. X models/army, and ) in the unit profiles of certain units entirely with Orc are modified, as indicated by TL X.

For example, Uncommon (TL Regular) means that if the General is a Tribe Leader, the Rarity becomes Regular, whereas max. 1 units/army means that if the General is a Tribe Leader, the Duplication Limit becomes max. 2 units/army.

ong-darrmu.title: Darrmu
ong-darrmu.def:
If the General is a Darrmu, apply the following changes to Army List creation:


  • Max. 10% of the Army Points may be spent on units entirely with Orc.

  • The Rarity and Duplication Limits Max. X items/army (i.e. max. X units/army, max. X models/army, and ) in the unit profiles of certain units entirely with Goblin are modified, as indicated by D X.

For example, Uncommon (D Regular) means that if the General is a Darrmu, the Rarity becomes Regular, whereas max. 1 units/army means that if the General is a Darrmu, the Duplication Limit becomes max. 2 units/army.

ong-goblin_cunning.title: Goblin Cunning
ong-goblin_cunning.def: Immediately before taking a Courage Test, that is not automatically passed, any unit consisting entirely of models with Goblin Cunning may choose to fail the Courage Test instead of rolling it.

ong-creepycrawlies.title: Creepy-Crawlies
ong-creepycrawlies.def: The model gains Ghost Step, and model parts with Mount gain Poison Attacks.

ong-headbashers.title: Headbashers
ong-headbashers.def:
Legendary.
Units containing Headbashers gain Bodyguard(General), and Rank-and-File model parts with Orc in the unit gain Lethal Strike.
Additionally, units entirely with Headbashers that count towards Core count towards Special instead.

ong-unprofessional_courtesy.title: Unprofessional Courtesy
ong-unprofessional_courtesy.def: Each unit can only be chosen up to three times per Player Turn for the Deployment of models with Hidden, Surprise.

ong-crude_weapons.title: Crude Weapons
ong-crude_weapons.def:
The model can never benefit from Parry.
After the First Round of Combat, all the model parts Melee Weapons count as a Hand Weapon for all rules purposes. Duration: End of Combat.

ong-brood_rivalry.title: Brood Rivalry
ong-brood_rivalry.def:
The model part gains +1 Att while another friendly unit is Engaged in Combat anywhere on the Battlefield.
Only Rank-and-File units can benefit from this rule.
Note: when Engaged in Combat, any non-Rank-and-File unit still counts as a unit Engaged in Combat for other units.

ong-force_of_destruction.title: Force of Destruction
ong-force_of_destruction.def:
Charges cannot be declared against the model with Force of Destruction.
This model is ignored by other units and ignores them for the purpose of Unit Spacing. It may contact and move through other units, and other units may contact and move through it (excluding Ambush).
When this model comes into contact with another unit, it is immediately removed as a casualty, and the other unit immediately suffers X hits with the model’s Strength and Armour Penetration.
If several units come into contact simultaneously, the owner of the model with Force of Destruction chooses which unit suffers the hits.
If the model was removed due to another unit moving into contact with it, that unit suffers an additional D6 hits. Health Point losses caused by Force of Destruction in the Charge Phase do not cause Panic Test.

ong-war_cry.title: War Cry!
ong-war_cry.def:
One use only. May be activated at the start of any friendly Player Turn, provided the General is on the Battlefield and not Shaken: apply the following effects, with Duration: One Turn.

  • Friendly units gain +1" Charge Speed and +1" Mobility.

  • If the General is a Goblin Demagogue or a Goblin Witch, friendly units entirely with Goblin gain Light Troops as long as they are not Engaged in Combat.

  • If the General is an Orc Warlord or an Orc Shaman, friendly units entirely with Orc have their Charge Range rolls Maximised.

ong-guile_and_fury.title: Guile and Fury
ong-guile_and_fury.def:
Can be cast in one of two versions:
Augment:
cannot be cast by Goblin.
The target gains +1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are increased by 1".

Hex: cannot be cast by Orc. The target suffers -1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1".

ong-omen_of_the_apocalypse.title: Omen of the Apocalypse
ong-omen_of_the_apocalypse.def:
+X Att, +X Str, and +X AP.
X is equal to the number of friendly units containing Orc that are Engaged in Combat anywhere on the Battlefield, up to a maximum of +3.

ong-attack_gnasher.title: Attack Gnasher
ong-attack_gnasher.def: The wielder gains 3 additional Standard Melee Attacks, whose Strength is always 5 and Armour Penetration always 2.

ong-troll_hide.title: Troll Hide
ong-troll_hide.def:
Mobility set to 6".
The model’s base size is changed to 40×40 mm, and its Height is set to 3.
(The model’s base size change cannot be ignored).

ong-goga_cauldron.title: Goga Cauldron
ong-goga_cauldron.def:
One use only. May be activated at the start of any Phase, or when Choosing Equipment and Abilities.
The bearer’s unit gains Fearless, Unstable, Dying Blow Duration: End of Turn .

ong-skull_fetish.title: Skull Fetish
ong-skull_fetish.def:
During the Siphon the Veil step of your Magic Phase, the wearer may gain Channel(D3) with Duration: One Phase.
If a ‘3’ is rolled for this, all units within 6" of the wearer, suffer the Witchfire Miscast effect, where X is equal to 5.

ong-monster_munch.title: Monster Munch
ong-monster_munch.def: The bearer can cast Totemic Summon (Shamanism) as a Bound Spell(6+).

ong-pan_of_protection_pinchin.title: Pan of Protection Pinchin’
ong-pan_of_protection_pinchin.def:
When successfully wounded, the wearer may choose to use the attacker’s Armour value and/or Special Save:
  • Use the total Armour value that the attacking model would have against the attack that inflicted the wound (including conditional application, modifiers, etc.).
If so, the wearer cannot use its own Armour value (including any modifiers), if available.
  • Use the Special Save that the attacking model would have against the attack that inflicted the wound (including conditional application, modifiers, etc.).
If so, the bearer cannot use its own Special Save (including any modifiers), if available.

ong-gnasher_bait.title: Gnasher Bait
ong-gnasher_bait.def: Friendly Gnasher and Gnasher Dasher units within 18" gain Frenzy, Fury, and their Charge Range rolls are Maximised.

ong-moon_shrooms.title: Moon Shrooms
ong-moon_shrooms.def:
Cannot be activated at the same turn as War Cry!.
The bearer’s unit gains the effects of Warcry as if the General had used it this turn.

ong-splatterer.title: Splatterer
ong-splatterer.def:
Splatterer - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Splatterer448"173Artillery, Area Attack(2×2), Direct Hit(Multiple Wounds(2))


Git Launcher - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Git Launcher448"1--Artillery, Git Launcher


Skewerer - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Skewerer448"1310Direct Hit(Str 6, Multiple Wounds(D3)), Area Attack(1×5), Skewerer

id-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
id-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Infernal Armour, Commanding Presence(12", Insignificant), First Strike(Stubborn).

id-theocratic_litigators.title: Theocratic Litigators
id-theocratic_litigators.def:
The model’s unit, as well as enemy units in contact with it, gain Magic Resistance(2), which is also applied to friendly spells.
This Magic Resistance value cannot be increased.

id-defy_death.title: Defy Death
id-defy_death.def: Melee Attacks against the model can never wound on better than 4+.

id-higher_calibre.title: Higher Calibre
id-higher_calibre.def:
The Range of the model’s Shooting Weapon is doubled.
Enemy units hit by the weapon suffer -1" Charge Speed and -1" Mobility, both to a minimum of 3", with Duration: One Turn.

id-firing_platform.title: Firing Platform
id-firing_platform.def:
Firing Platform: Shooting Attacks against the model’s unit are all resolved against the Infernal Bastion.In addition, when shooting or casting spells, models in the Infernal Bastion’s unit may draw Line of Sight as if they were Height 5, and from any point of the Infernal Bastion’s Front Facing, as long as the unit has at least one Proper Rank:
  • A maximum of 20 models can shoot from the unit.
These models can shoot regardless of the rank they are positioned in.
  • Measure their range from the Infernal Bastion.

*See Infernal Bastion Unit Entry.

id-full_steam_ahead.title: Full Steam Ahead!
id-full_steam_ahead.def: The model cannot choose to Pursue, unless it is the First Round of Combat and it is Charging –– in which case it must Pursue (including Overrun).

id-rock_crusher.title: Rock Crusher
id-rock_crusher.def: The Chassis’s Str is set to 6, and its AP is set to 3.

id-walking_earthquake.title: Walking Earthquake
id-walking_earthquake.def: The models Mobility is set to 7" and it gains Swiftstride,Volcanic Embrace(D3+1).

id-riddle_of_the_lamassu.title: Riddle of the Lamassu
id-riddle_of_the_lamassu.def:
During the opponents Pre-game Selections, the opponent must choose Power or Wisdom.
  • Power: the model gains Channel(1).
  • Wisdom: immediately choose up to two units from the opponent’s Army List: the chosen units begin the game with an Incendiary Marker.

id-keys_to_the_citadel.title: Keys to the Citadel
id-keys_to_the_citadel.def:
The model must buy Weapon Enchantments for two of its mundane weapons.
The Points Cost of one of the Weapon Enchantments (the cheapest if applicable) is halved, rounding fractions up.

id-vassal_governor.title: Vassal Governor
id-vassal_governor.def: Friendly units with Vassal within 12" of one or more models with Vassal Governor gain +1" Mobility.

id-chained_together.title: Chained Together
id-chained_together.def:
The model’s unit may never voluntarily change its number of files.
After performing a March Move, the unit loses D6 HP.

id-unbranded.title: Unbranded
id-unbranded.def: The model cannot take any Army Specific Magic Items, and can never learn, or swap spells to gain Curse of Nezibkesh.

id-taurukh_ritual.title: Taurukh Ritual
id-taurukh_ritual.def:
Rare

Apply the following to the model:
  • It gains Impact Hits(1), Swiftstride, Centauroid, and its Height is set to 2.

  • Its Charge Speed and Mobility are both set to 7".

  • Its base size is changed to 25×50mm.


Apply the following to the model:
  • It gains Impact Hits(1), Swiftstride, Centauroid, and its Height is set to 2.

  • Its Charge Speed and Mobility are both set to 7".

  • Its base size is changed to 25×50mm.

id-oil_flasks.title: Oil Flasks
id-oil_flasks.def:
A Health Pool can use Oil Flasks X times.
Each use reduces X by 1; when X is 0, the rule cannot be used.
Declare that you wish to use the rule before rolling to hit.
If that is the case, after resolving all simultaneous attacks, any unit hit by at least one attack with Oil Flasks gains an Incendiary Marker.

id-volcanic_embrace.title: Volcanic Embrace
id-volcanic_embrace.def:
The model part gains Grind Attack(X, AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, Unmodifiable, Zeal(towards Metal Armour)).
These hits always wound on a 4+.

id-flintlock_axe.title: Flintlock Axe
id-flintlock_axe.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Flintlock AxeX18"142 Counts as Halberd when Engaged in Combat


Counts as Halberd when Engaged in Combat

id-blunderbuss.title: Blunderbuss
id-blunderbuss.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Blunderbuss512"153March and Shoot, Stand and Shoot, Accurate, Quick to Fire,

id-naphtha_thrower.title: Naphtha Thrower
id-naphtha_thrower.def:
-1.
Rarity: Rare.

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Naphtha Thrower212"141Artillery,Accurate, Area Attack(3×5),Flaming Attacks, March and Shoot

id-prophet_of_ashuruk.title: Prophet of Ashuruk
id-prophet_of_ashuruk.def:
During Pre-game Selections, regardless of its chosen Path of Magic, the model may exchange one of its spells for the Apprentice Spell (#1) of either Alchemy, Pyromancy, Occultism.
In addition, it gains access to the options below:

id-prophet_of_lugar.title: Prophet of Lugar
id-prophet_of_lugar.def:
The model gains Aegis(4+), Aegis(3+, against Flaming Attacks), suffers -3 Arm, and loses Metal Armour and Infernal Armour.
The model part gains Flaming Attacks,Magical Attacks.
In addition, the model gains access to the options below:

id-prophet_of_shamut.title: Prophet of Shamut
id-prophet_of_shamut.def: The model gains access to the options below:

id-prophet_of_nezibkesh.title: Prophet of Nezibkesh
id-prophet_of_nezibkesh.def:
The model gains Engineer(Gunnery Team, Infernal Artillery or Infernal Engine).
In addition, it gains access to the options below:

id-tower_shield.title: Tower Shield
id-tower_shield.def: The model gains +1 Arm, Parry, Hard Target(1).

id-infernal_lash.title: Infernal Lash
id-infernal_lash.def:
+2 Agi.
Once per Melee Phase, when Choosing Equipment and Abilities in a Combat within 6" of the wielder, you may activate the following ability:

Choose a single friendly unit within 6" of the wielder (which can be the wielder itself).

The chosen unit gains Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks. Duration: One Phase.

id-big_brother.title: Big Brother
id-big_brother.def: The model’s HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and the roll for the number of hits with its Stomp Attack is Maximised.

id-incendiary.title: Incendiary
id-incendiary.def:
Give one Incendiary Marker to the unit, with Duration: Permanent.
A unit containing one or more Incendiary Markers gains Weakness(Flaming Attacks).
Remove one Incendiary Marker:
  • Immediately when the unit suffers one or more wounds (before saves are performed) from Ranged Attacks with Flaming Attacks.
  • At the end of a Round of Combat in which the unit has suffered one or more wounds (before saves are performed) from Melee Attacks with Flaming Attacks.
A Character leaving a unit affected by one or more Incendiary Markers is no longer affected, unless the Character was a single model unit when it gained Incendiary Markers. In that case, the Character keeps those Incendiary Markers.

id-airborne_legends.title: Airborne Legends
id-airborne_legends.def: All models with Fly share the same Rare models/army restriction.

id-curse_of_nezibkesh.title: Curse of Nezibkesh
id-curse_of_nezibkesh.def: The target gains an Incendiary Marker. In addition, it suffers -1 Def and -1 Off, as well as an additional -1 Def and -1 Off as long as it has 1 or more Incendiary Markers.

id-onyx_core.title: Onyx Core
id-onyx_core.def: Strength always 6; Flaming Attacks, Multiple Wounds(D3, towards Weakness(Flaming Attacks)).

id-eye_of_the_bull.title: Eye of the Bull
id-eye_of_the_bull.def:
Affects both Shooting and Standard Melee Attacks.
Attack Value is always 1, Strength always 5, and Armour Penetration always 10.
Automatic Hits, Multiple Wounds(2, Melee).

id-kadim_binding.title: Kadim Binding
id-kadim_binding.def: Aegis(+1, against Flaming Attacks, max. 3+), Hand-and-a-Half.

id-blaze_of_protection.title: Blaze of Protection
id-blaze_of_protection.def:
The bearer’s Armour value is set to 6.

At the end of Agility Step 0, each enemy model in contact with the bearer’s model that could have allocated attacks towards it, but chose not to, suffers 1 hit with Str 4, AP 0, Magical Attacks, Flaming Attacks, Unmodifiable.

id-banner_of_the_twicebranded.title: Banner of the Twice-Branded
id-banner_of_the_twicebranded.def: Models in the bearer’s unit gain Shoot in Extra Rank.

id-banner_of_shamut.title: Banner of Shamut
id-banner_of_shamut.def:
Models in the bearer’s unit gain +1 Off.
In addition, a unit containing a Banner of Shamut adds +1 to the Combat Score of its side.

id-their_masters_banner.title: Their Master’s Banner
id-their_masters_banner.def:
Apply the following effects while the bearer’s unit is within range of a friendly model’s Commanding Presence:
  • Model parts with Vassal in the bearer’s unit gain Fury.
  • The bearer’s unit must reroll failed Charge Range rolls in the Charge Phase.

id-mask_of_ages.title: Mask of Ages
id-mask_of_ages.def: The wearer gains Aegis(5+, against Grind Attack, Impact Hits, Magical Attacks, Stomp Attack), Terror, Hatred.

id-golden_idol_of_shamut.title: Golden Idol of Shamut
id-golden_idol_of_shamut.def:
The bearer can cast Flaming Swords (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell(3+).
In addition, if the bearer’s model is Height 1, its Charge Speed is set to 4", its Mobility is set to 6", and it gains Ghost Step.

id-tablet_of_vezodinezh.title: Tablet of Vezodinezh
id-tablet_of_vezodinezh.def: When the bearer attempts to cast a Learned Spell using four or more Magic Dice, treat a single rolled ‘1’ or ‘2’ as a ‘3’.

id-lugars_dice.title: Lugar’s Dice
id-lugars_dice.def:
A single model part of the bearer’s model can reroll a single failed to-hit, to-wound, or Armour Save roll per Player Turn.
This cannot be used for Crush Attacks.

id-breath_of_the_brass_bull.title: Breath of the Brass Bull
id-breath_of_the_brass_bull.def:
The bearer’s model gains +1 HP and First Strike(Grind Attack(X, Magical Attacks, Toxic Attacks)).
X is equal to the number of models in contact with the bearer’s unit’s Front Facing.

id-ring_of_desiccation.title: Ring of Desiccation
id-ring_of_desiccation.def: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, each enemy unit in contact with the wearer’s model gains an Incendiary Marker.

id-vassal_slingshot.title: Vassal Slingshot
id-vassal_slingshot.def:
Vassal Slingshot - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Vassal Slingshot448"1310Area Attack(1×5), Direct Hit(Str 6, Multiple Wounds(D3)), Oil Flasks(4)

dl-falling_star.title: Falling Star
dl-falling_star.def:
At the start of step 3.a Determine Agility Order the models Agility is set to twice the model’s current number of Health Points.
At the start of each Agility Step, the model’s Defensive Skill, and Offensive Skill, are set to twice the model’s current number of Health Points.

dl-favoured_of_pride.title: Favoured of Pride
dl-favoured_of_pride.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with an Omen of Savar as the General.
The unit may select up to two Manifestations instead of one.

dl-acid_blood.title: Acid Blood
dl-acid_blood.def:
Each time a model with Acid Blood fails a Regeneration Save against an enemy Melee Attack, it
immediately inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks towards the Health Pool of the attacking model, before any casualties are removed.

dl-favoured_of_gluttony.title: Favoured of Gluttony
dl-favoured_of_gluttony.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with a Maw of Akaan as the General.
The unit gains Solitary and may select up to two Manifestations instead of one.

dl-favoured_of_wrath.title: Favoured of Wrath
dl-favoured_of_wrath.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with a
Vanadra’s Scourge as the General.
The unit gains Solitary and may select up to two Manifestations instead of one.

dl-razor_tentacles.title: Razor Tentacles
dl-razor_tentacles.def: The model gains +5 Att while Engaged in the Flank or Rear Facing of an enemy unit.

dl-tightening_grasp.title: Tightening Grasp
dl-tightening_grasp.def:
The model part gains Grind Attack(X).
After each Round of Combat, X increases by 1 (e.g. Grind Attack(1) becomes Grind Attack(2))
When the model is not Engaged in Combat, X is set to 1.
When a model part with Tightening Grasp is in the second rank, and not in contact with any enemy model, it can make all its hits from Grind Attack across models directly in front of it in the Front Rank.

dl-favoured_of_greed.title: Favoured of Greed
dl-favoured_of_greed.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with a
Miser of Sugulag as the General.
The unit gains Solitary and may select up to two Manifestations instead of one.

dl-engine_of_damnation.title: Engine of Damnation
dl-engine_of_damnation.def:
Extraordinary.
The model’s base size is changed to 150×100 mm, its Height is changed to 5, its Health Points are set to 9, its Charge Speed is set to 5.
In addition, it loses War Platform, Attached, and it gains Terror,Stomp Attack(D6),Solitary.

dl-favoured_of_sloth.title: Favoured of Sloth
dl-favoured_of_sloth.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with a Sentinel of Nukuja as the General.
The unit may select up to two Manifestations instead of one.

dl-firestarter.title: Firestarter(X)
dl-firestarter.def:
The unit can cast the spell stated in brackets as a Bound Spell (4+).
When casting the spell choose one Rank-and-File model to be the Caster.

dl-wings.title: Wings
dl-wings.def: The model’s Charge Speed and Mobility are both set to 7", and it gains Fly.

dl-know_thyself.title: Know Thyself
dl-know_thyself.def: At the beginning of the Agility Step when the model’s Standard Melee Attacks are allocated, select one model part from each enemy model in contact with this model. Add their Attack Value Characteristics, excluding any modifiers, to the Attack Value of the Kuulima's Deceiver. Duration: Round of Combat.

dl-veil_stalker.title: Veil Stalker
dl-veil_stalker.def: For every successfully cast spell in the opponents previous Magic Phase, this unit’s Ambush roll gains one instance of Maximised.

dl-favoured_of_envy.title: Favoured of Envy
dl-favoured_of_envy.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with a
Kuulima's Deceiver as the General.
The unit gains Solitary and may select up to two Manifestations instead of one.

dl-devour.title: Devour
dl-devour.def:
For each Health Point loss the model causes with Melee Attacks, roll a D6 at the end of the Agility Step.
For each 4+ rolled, the model gains +1 Health Point.
If the model’s Health Points reach 20 or more, all units within 9" immediately suffer 2D6 hits with Toxic Attacks, and the model is removed as a casualty.

dl-path_of_destruction.title: Path of Destruction
dl-path_of_destruction.def:
This model part can allocate its Stomp Attack onto Health Pools of Height 4 or less (rather than 0-1).
If the model part’s Stomp Attack is allocated towards a Health Pool with Height (3–4), the total number of hits is halved, rounding fractions up.

dl-bribed_enchantments.title: Bribed Enchantments
dl-bribed_enchantments.def: During Step 2.b of each Round of Combat (Calculate Static Combat Score), select a single enemy unit the model is in contact with, for each Magic Item in the selected unit, the bearer’s side add +1 to its Combat Score, to a maximum of +3.

dl-divine_right.title: Divine Right
dl-divine_right.def: While an enemy Character is in contact with the model’s unit, the model gains Distracting(1).

dl-omniscience.title: Omniscience
dl-omniscience.def: If one or more models with Omniscience have neither Marched nor Charged in this Player Turn, the owner’s limit on Excess Magic is increased by 2.

dl-strixian_spirit.title: Strixian Spirit
dl-strixian_spirit.def:
The model’s Height is changed to 5.
In addition, its HP are set to 7, its Charge Speed and Mobility are both set to 7", and it gains Fly,Light Troops,Terror,Stomp Attack(D6),Solitary.

dl-favoured_of_lust.title: Favoured of Lust
dl-favoured_of_lust.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with a Courtesan of Cibaresh as the General.
The unit gains Solitary and may select up to two Manifestations instead of one.

dl-horde_thresher.title: Horde Thresher
dl-horde_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:
  • Base size changed to 100×100mm.
  • HP set to 6.
  • Number of Tillers and Hellsteeds set to (3).
  • Tillers lose Smother(1) and gain Smother(2).
  • Chassis gains Impact Hits(3D3).
  • Single model.

dl-legion_thresher.title: Legion Thresher
dl-legion_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:
  • Base size changed to 100×150mm.
  • HP set to 8.
  • Number of Tillers and Hellsteeds set to (4).
  • Tillers lose Smother(1) and gain Smother(2).
  • Chassis gains Impact Hits(4D3).
  • Single model.

dl-mountain_breaker.title: Mountain Breaker
dl-mountain_breaker.def:
The model’s Charge Range rolls towards units containing Height 5 gain Maximised.
Impact Hits gain Multiple Wounds(D3, towards Height 5).

dl-morphlings.title: Morphlings
dl-morphlings.def:
During Pre-game Selections, each unit of Veil Serpents must choose one of the following Manifestations, it gains the chosen Manifestations.
Duration: Permanent:
• Mesmerising Plumage
• Torporous Tendrils
• Venom Sacs

dl-smother.title: Smother
dl-smother.def: Melee Attacks towards a model with  Height X  gain +1 to hit and +1 to wound.

dl-dark_fire.title: Dark Fire
dl-dark_fire.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Magical Attacks. Dark FireX18"240Armour Save rolls of ‘1’, ‘2’, ‘3’, and ‘4’ are always failed when saving wounds caused by Dark Fire.


Armour Save rolls of ‘1’, ‘2’, ‘3’, and ‘4’ are always failed when saving wounds caused by Dark Fire.

dl-span_classtextbfpath_of_destructionsp.title: Path of Destruction
dl-span_classtextbfpath_of_destructionsp.def:
This model part can allocate its Stomp Attack onto Health Pools of Height 4 or less (rather than 0-1).

If the model part’s Stomp Attack is allocated towards a Health Pool with Height (3–4), the total number of hits is halved, rounding fractions up.

dl-aether_battery.title: Aether Battery
dl-aether_battery.def:
If the model did not move this turn, the number of shots gains Maximised

Aether Battery
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Aeth. Battery318"3D641Magical Attacks, If the model did not move this turn, the number of shots gains Maximised

dl-guiding_manifestations.title: Guiding Manifestations
dl-guiding_manifestations.def:
Daemonic Manifestations that have options for Guiding Manifestations have two point costs, the Guided versions point cost and rules are written with with this colour-coding and notation.

Guiding versions must be noted on your Army List.
Guiding Manifestations affect both the bearer and all Rank-and-File models in the bearer's unit, as if the models themselves had the Daemonic Manifestation.

Note that Guiding and non-Guiding Manifestations are considered to be the same Daemonic Manifestation.

dl-hell_can_wait.title: Hell Can Wait
dl-hell_can_wait.def:
One use only. Duration: One Phase.
May be activated just before the model's unit rolls a Break Test.

The Break Test is automatically failed, and the HP loss suffered from Supernal is halved, rounding fractions down.

dl-unnatural_roots.title: Unnatural Roots
dl-unnatural_roots.def: A unit containing one or more Manifestations of Unnatural Roots gains Resolute(+1).

dl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.title: Mark of the Eternal Champion
dl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.def:
The unit or model knows (or gains) Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell) as an additional spell.

If the unit or model is not a Wizard, it instead gains Wizard Conclave(1) that knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell).

dl-clinging_ichor.title: Clinging Ichor
dl-clinging_ichor.def: Enemy units in contact with the model lose Devastating Charge.

dl-mirrored_scales.title: Mirrored Scales
dl-mirrored_scales.def: Each Melee Attack allocated against the model that rolls a ‘1’ to hit, is instead allocated to the attacking model’s Health Pool with Automatic Hits.

dl-dark_hide.title: Dark Hide
dl-dark_hide.def: At the start of Defender's Advantage (Battle Setup, Step 3.5) , you may remove units entirely with this Manifestation from the Battlefield and Deploy them again elsewhere, following the general Deployment restrictions.

dl-trampling_hooves.title: Trampling Hooves
dl-trampling_hooves.def: Model parts without Mount or Construct gain Grind Attack(D3, Str 5, AP 2, Magical Attacks, Unmodifiable).

dl-hellish_larynx.title: Hellish Larynx
dl-hellish_larynx.def: The model part gains Breath Attack(Str 3, AP 2) Magical Attacks, Stand and Shoot.

dl-horrifying_visage.title: Horrifying Visage
dl-horrifying_visage.def:
One use only. Duration: One Phase.
May be activated at the start of a friendly Charge Phase.

When activated, the model gains Horror, and its Charge Range rolls gain Maximised.

dl-digestive_vomit.title: Digestive Vomit
dl-digestive_vomit.def:
If a model with Digestive Vomit is on on the winning side of a Combat, it gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

Duration: Permanent.

dl-unholy_appetite.title: Unholy Appetite
dl-unholy_appetite.def: After a Round of Combat in which at least one attack with Unholy Appetite caused any HP loss, all attacks with Unholy Appetite gain Hatred until the end of the next Player Turn.

dl-segmented_shell.title: Segmented Shell
dl-segmented_shell.def: Attacks with Multiple Wounds(X) against the model reduce their X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

dl-hidden_knives.title: Hidden Knives
dl-hidden_knives.def: Melee Attacks allocated by the model against an enemy unit’s Flank or Rear Facing gain +1 Str and +1 AP.

dl-golden_helm.title: Golden Helm
dl-golden_helm.def: Courage Tests taken by the unit gain Minimised.

dl-manifestation.title: Manifestation
dl-manifestation.def:
During Pre-game Selections, each Exalted Herald must choose two different Manifestations from the list below and apply the effects during the game.

The model must select two spells out of those indicated for the chosen Manifestations, Wrath of God (Thaumaturgy), and Hellfire (Hereditary Spell) (this replaces the normal rules for Spell Selection connected to being a Wizard Adept).

dl-sorcerous_antennae.title: Sorcerous Antennae
dl-sorcerous_antennae.def: During the Siphon the Veil step of your Magic Phase, gain one Magic Dice for each unit containing this Manifestation.

dl-incendiary_ichor.title: Incendiary Ichor
dl-incendiary_ichor.def:
Aegis(3+, against Flaming Attacks), Flaming Attacks(Melee & Shooting).
The model automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.

dl-curved_tusks.title: Curved Tusks
dl-curved_tusks.def:
The model part’s Melee Attacks gain +1 Str and +1 AP.

For each Melee Attack where a ‘1’ is rolled to wound, the model with Curved Tusks suffers a hit that wounds automatically, with AP 10.

dl-immortal_denizens.title: Immortal Denizens
dl-immortal_denizens.def:
Casting Rolls made by a model with Daemon in this army using two or three Magic Dice gain a +1 modifier.
In games involving one or more Daemon Legions Army´s, the Active Player gains one additional Magic Dice, during the Siphon the Veil step in their Magic Phase (i.e. both players gain one additional Magic Dice in their Player Turn).

dl-spear_of_infinity.title: Spear of Infinity
dl-spear_of_infinity.def:
The target suffers 1 hit with Str 2, AP 2, Area Attack(1×5), Magical Attacks, Direct Hit(Str 4, AP 3, Multiple Wounds(2)).
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Str for each spell successfully cast before this spell in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

bh-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
bh-giant_see_giant_do.def:
The model gains Drunkard, Strider(Forest).
At the end of a friendly Movement Phase, if the model is in contact with a Forest, it may lose all its current weapons and gain Uprooted Tree.

bh-big_brother.title: Big Brother
bh-big_brother.def: The model’s HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and the roll for the number of hits it does with its Stomp Attack gains Maximised.

bh-giant_club.title: Giant Club
bh-giant_club.def:
- Melee Weapon

+1 Str, +1 AP.

+1 Str, +1 AP.

bh-uprooted_tree.title: Uprooted Tree
bh-uprooted_tree.def:
- Melee Weapon

Attacks made with this weapon gain Automatic Hits and always have Str 5 and AP 0.

Attacks made with this weapon gain Automatic Hits and always have Str 5 and AP 0.

bh-sleeper.title: Sleeper
bh-sleeper.def: Starting on Game Turn 1, a model with Sleeper may decide whether its arrival from Ambush succeeds or fails, without rolling the dice.

bh-strength_from_flesh.title: Strength from Flesh
bh-strength_from_flesh.def:
- Attack Attribute

Standard Melee Attacks that roll a ‘6’ to wound gain Multiple Wounds(D3).
If at least one such attack causes an HP loss, this model Recovers 1 HP at the end of the Agility Step (unless it was removed as a casualty).

Standard Melee Attacks that roll a ‘6’ to wound gain Multiple Wounds(D3).

If at least one such attack causes an HP loss, this model Recovers 1 HP at the end of the Agility Step (unless it was removed as a casualty).

bh-aura_of_madness.title: Aura of Madness
bh-aura_of_madness.def: Enemy units within 6" of one or more models with Aura of Madness suffer -1 Discipline.

bh-hunting_horn.title: Hunting Horn
bh-hunting_horn.def: Friendly units within 6" of one or more models with Hunting Horn, gain +1" Cha.

bh-blood_offering.title: Blood Offering
bh-blood_offering.def: A unit that contains a Character with Blood Offering may reroll failed Panic Tests at the cost of inflicting one wound with no saves of any kind allowed on a Character with Blood Offering in the unit.

bh-beer_barrel.title: Beer Barrel
bh-beer_barrel.def:
The model gains Looted Booze. One use only.

This weapon can be used as a Shooting Weapon with the following profile:

bh-pack_tactics.title: Pack Tactics
bh-pack_tactics.def: Charge Range rolls made towards an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing are Maximised.

bh-drunkard.title: Drunkard
bh-drunkard.def:
The unit gains one of two sets of effects depending on whether it shows up Sober or Drunk on the Battlefield.

During Pre-game Selections, each unit containing Drunkard must choose whether it is Sober or Drunk.

Drunk Characters cannot join units containing any Sober models and vice versa (models without Drunkard are considered neither Drunk nor Sober).

bh-sober.title: Sober
bh-sober.def:
The model gains Light Troops, Vanguard.
A unit that has been Sober at any point during the game is never considered Scoring.

bh-drunk.title: Drunk
bh-drunk.def:
The model gains Devastating Charge(+1 Str, +1 AP), Fearless, Unruly.
Drunk units cannot choose to Ambush.

bh-looted_booze.title: Looted Booze
bh-looted_booze.def:
One use only. May be activated at the start of any Player Turn.
All models with Drunkard in the model's unit change from Sober to Drunk.

bh-hunting_call.title: Hunting Call
bh-hunting_call.def:
If the Army List includes a model with Hunting Call, the owner may reroll Ambush rolls of ‘1’ and ‘2’.

If the owner has the second Player Turn, any unit containing Pack Tactics may choose to roll for its Ambush starting from Player Turn 1.

bh-primal_instinct.title: Primal Instinct
bh-primal_instinct.def:
During Choose Equipment and Abilities each unit containing this Attack Attribute must take a Courage Test.
If the test is passed, all model parts with Primal Instinct in the unit gain Hatred. Duration: Round of Combat.

bh-echoes_of_the_dark_forest.title: Echoes of the Dark Forest
bh-echoes_of_the_dark_forest.def:
The target gains Fearless.
In addition, it may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move. This spell may target units in Ambush. If so, the target unit immediately enters the Battlefied following normal Ambush rules, instead of performing a Magical Move.

bh-hawthorne_curse.title: Hawthorne Curse
bh-hawthorne_curse.def:
Devastating Charge(+2 Str, +2 AP).

The weapon can be used as a Shooting Weapon (3+) with the following profile: Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 10, Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit(Str 6, Multiple Wounds(D3)). This Shooting Attack never suffers negative to-hit modifiers.

bh-twin_hungers.title: Twin Hungers
bh-twin_hungers.def:
Lethal Strike. Melee Attacks that roll a ‘6’ to wound and causes a HP loss the wielder may Recover 1 HP at the end of the Agility Step (unless their model was removed as a casualty).
Only 1 HP can be regained per Phase with this item.

bh-fatal_folly.title: Fatal Folly
bh-fatal_folly.def:
For each Melee Attack against the wielder's model that rolls a to-hit roll of ‘1’, the wielder must perform a Standard Melee Attack at the end of the same Agility Step (this overrides the normal restriction that Beast Axe attacks always strike at Agility Step 0).

This attack can only be allocated against the model or Health Pool that rolled the ‘1’ to hit, and is not considered a Standard Melee Attack for the purpose of Restricted Attacks..

bh-aaghors_affliction.title: Aaghor’s Affliction
bh-aaghors_affliction.def:
+1 Res, and Regeneration(4+).

The model loses Light Armour and Metal Armour, and automatically fails all its Armour Saves.

bh-wild_form.title: Wild Form
bh-wild_form.def:
Duration: Round of Combat. During Choose Equipment and Abilities, the bearer may gain either of the following:

  • -1 Res, +1 Str, +1 AP
  • +1 Res, -1 Str, -1 AP

bh-banner_of_the_wild_herd.title: Banner of the Wild Herd
bh-banner_of_the_wild_herd.def:
One use only. Duration: One Phase. May be activated during Choose Equipment and Abilities.

Rank-and-File model parts with Wildhorn in the bearer’s unit have their Str set to 4 and their AP set to 1.

bh-rain_augur_brew.title: Rain Augur Brew
bh-rain_augur_brew.def:
Duration: One Turn. If the bearer is on the Battlefield, this item is automatically activated at the start of the first Game Turn, if not it has no effect.

All Ranged Attacks suffer -1 to hit.

bh-pillager_icon.title: Pillager Icon
bh-pillager_icon.def: All friendly units of Raiding Chariots, Razortusks, and Razortusk Chariots, excluding Characters, within 12" of the bearer gain Vanguard.

bh-seed_of_the_dark_forest.title: Seed of the Dark Forest
bh-seed_of_the_dark_forest.def:
During Pre-game Selections, place a Forest:

  • Touching your Deployment Zone.
  • Not in contact with any Terrain Feature .

This Forest is a 10"6" rectangle, that can not be chosen for Primary- or Secondary Objectives.
Friendly units entirely with Pack Tactics treat this Forest as part of their Deployment Zone, for the purpose of where they can be Deployed.

A unit that starts the game in contact with this Forest cannot declare a Charge in the first Player Turn of the first Game Turn.

bh-eye_of_dominance.title: Eye of Dominance
bh-eye_of_dominance.def: The bearer gains Distracting(2, against Beasts, Mounts).

bh-crown_of_madness.title: Crown of Madness
bh-crown_of_madness.def:
The wearer gains First Strike(Stubborn), and the wearer’s unit gains Unruly.

In addition, all units entirely with Unruly within range of the wearer’s Commanding Presence (if applicable) gain First Strike(Stubborn).

bh-gnarled_hide_totem.title: Gnarled Hide Totem
bh-gnarled_hide_totem.def: The target gains +1 Arm and Distracting(1).

bh-blooded_horn_totem.title: Blooded Horn Totem
bh-blooded_horn_totem.def: The target gains +1 Att and +2 AP.

bh-clouded_eye_totem.title: Clouded Eye Totem
bh-clouded_eye_totem.def: The target gains Hard Target(1), Magic Resistance(3).

bh-black_wing_totem.title: Black Wing Totem
bh-black_wing_totem.def: The target gains  +2" Cha and +3 Agi.

bh-totem_bearers.title: Totem Bearers
bh-totem_bearers.def:
The unit gains a single Bound Spell chosen from the list below, which must be noted on the Army List.
When casting the spell, choose one Rank-and-File model in the unit as the model casting the spell.
The spell can only target the unit itself.

bh-greater_totem_bearers.title: Greater Totem Bearers
bh-greater_totem_bearers.def: The model gains all four Bound Spells from the list below, with Range 18".

bh-hurl_attack.title: Hurl Attack
bh-hurl_attack.def:
Hurl Attack - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Hurl Attack424"173Artillery, Area Attack (2×2), Direct Hit(Multiple Wounds(2)), Divine Attacks,

eos-holy_relic.title: Holy Relic
eos-holy_relic.def:
Friendly units within 8" of the model gain First Strike(Hatred). Model parts with Mount are not affected.
Bound Spells from Blessings cast by the rider have their Range set to 8″ and gain the Type: Aura.
The model can cast Fate’s Judgement (Divination) as a Bound Spell(3+).

eos-aura_of_power.title: Aura of Power
eos-aura_of_power.def:
Units within 8" of one or more friendly models with Aura of Power gain +2 Def and +2 Off. Model parts with Mount are not affected.
The model can cast its chosen spell as a Bound Spell(5+).

eos-master_artificer.title: Master Artificer
eos-master_artificer.def: The model gains Imperial Authority, but is limited to the Order Ready! Aim! Fire!. In addition, for the purpose of this rule, any unit of Reiters the model has joined is considered to be a Parent Unit.

eos-cannon.title: Cannon
eos-cannon.def:
- Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Cannon448"152Artillery,Area Attack(1×3),Direct Hit(Str 10, AP 4, Multiple Wounds(D3+1))

eos-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
eos-meeting_of_minds.def: The model may give one additional Order.

eos-wilderness_guides.title: Wilderness Guides
eos-wilderness_guides.def: At the beginning of step 3.6 of the Battle Setup, Move Vanguarding Units, choose one friendly Parent or Support Unit within 8" of a unit containing Wilderness Guides: the chosen unit gains Vanguard(3").

eos-silver_shots.title: Silver Shots
eos-silver_shots.def: Shooting Attacks made by the model part with a Crossbow, Brace of Pistols, Repeater Pistol gain Lethal Strike, Zeal.

eos-first_knight.title: First Knight
eos-first_knight.def:
While the model is joined to a unit of Knightly Orders, the unit gains the following rules:
  • Fearless.
  • If the model is the General, its Rank-and-File models also gain Parent Unit.

eos-great_tactician.title: Great Tactician
eos-great_tactician.def: The model may give one additional Order.

eos-imperial_prince.title: Imperial Prince
eos-imperial_prince.def: The model part is equipped with a Hand Weapon enchanted with The Light of Sonnstahl, and can only take up to 50 pts of Magic Items.

eos-zealot.title: Zealot
eos-zealot.def: The model gains Exclusive(Flagellants), Fearless, Dying Blow, Unstable.

eos-fire_on_impact.title: Fire on Impact!
eos-fire_on_impact.def:
- Attack Attribute



The model part gains Devastating Charge(always Str 4, always AP 2, always Agi 10).

eos-steam_powered.title: Steam Powered
eos-steam_powered.def:
The model’s rolls for Random Movement gain Maximised.
The model may choose not to move despite having Random Movement.
The model cannot choose to Pursue –– unless it is Charging, in which case it must Pursue (including Overrun).

eos-steam_cannon.title: Steam Cannon
eos-steam_cannon.def:
- Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Steam Cannon336"152Artillery,Area Attack(1×3), Direct Hit(Str 10, AP 4, Multiple Wounds(D3+1)), Unwieldy(1)

eos-blessings.title: Blessings
eos-blessings.def:
A unit containing Blessings gains First Strike(Hatred). Model parts with Mount are not affected.
The model can cast the following three Bound Spells(3+), with Type: Caster, and Duration: One Turn. ullorUllor’s Blessing The target’s unit gains Aegis(5+, against Melee Attacks). sunnaSunna's Blessing The target’s unit gains Flaming Attacks.
Each enemy unit in contact with the target’s unit when the spell is cast, suffers D6 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks. volundVolund’s Blessing The target’s unit gains Zeal.

eos-imperial_authority.title: Imperial Authority
eos-imperial_authority.def:
At the start of each friendly Player Turn, each model with Imperial Authority may select one of the following effects, called Orders, and apply it to a single unit, with Duration: One Turn. The target unit must:


  • Be a Parent or Support Unit.

  • Be the model’s own unit, or be within range of the model’s Commanding Presence or Rally Around the Flag (if it has one of these rules).

  • The chosen target cannot already be under the effect of an Order.


On The Double!The target gains +1" Cha and +2" Mob.
Steady, Men! The target gains Disciplined, and its Courage Tests gain Minimised.
Ready! Aim! Fire!The target gains Accurate. Brace For Impact!The target gains Fight in Extra Rank.

eos-trained_ferocity.title: Trained Ferocity
eos-trained_ferocity.def: While Engaged in the same Combined Combat as another friendly unit, the model part gains +1 Att and First Strike(Hatred).

eos-long_rifle.title: Long Rifle
eos-long_rifle.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Long Rifle236"153Multiple Wounds(2, towards Height 1--2), Unwieldy(2)


Range 48", 1, Str 5, AP 3, Multiple Wounds (2, contre taille Standard), Unwieldy.

eos-brace_of_pistols.title: Brace of Pistols
eos-brace_of_pistols.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Brace of PistolsX12"242Stand and Shoot, Quick to Fire, Counts as Paired Weapons when Engaged in Combat


Counts as Paired Weapons when Engaged in Combat

eos-repeater_pistol.title: Repeater Pistol
eos-repeater_pistol.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Repeater Pistol312"342Stand and Shoot, Quick to Fire

eos-state_detachment.title: State Detachment
eos-state_detachment.def: The unit replaces Parent Unit and Metal Armour with Support Unit and Light Armour. Its Armour is set to 1.

eos-imperial_detachment.title: Imperial Detachment
eos-imperial_detachment.def: The unit replaces Parent Unit with Support Unit.

eos-parent_unit.title: Parent Unit
eos-parent_unit.def: A unit containing a model with this rule is referred to as a Parent Unit. Parent Units treat Support Units as Insignificant.

eos-support_unit.title: Support Unit
eos-support_unit.def:
A unit containing a model with this rule is referred to as a Support Unit.
A Support Unit with at least one Proper Rank is considered to be Steady if a friendly Parent Unit in the same Combined Combat is Steady, and Solid if a friendly Parent Unit in the same Combined Combat is Solid.

During the opponent’s Charge Phase, Support Units may perform one of the following actions:


  • Supporting Fire: the Support Unit may perform an out of sequence Shooting Attack towards an enemy unit that has successfully performed a Charge Move into a friendly Parent Unit within 8".
Apply the normal rules for Shooting Attacks, ignoring the Parent Unit for Cover and Line of Sight purposes.

  • Counter Charge: after enemy units finish their Charge Moves, Support Units within 8" of a successfully charged friendly Parent Unit may choose one enemy unit that Charged the Parent Unit and declare a Charge, applying the normal rules for Charging (Line of Sight, Front Arc, rolls for Charge Range, etc.).
A Support Unit that performs a Counter Charge is considered to have 0 Proper Ranks for the purpose of inflicting Surrounded, until it is no longer Engaged in Combat.

eos-liberal_magics.title: Liberal Magics
eos-liberal_magics.def: During Pre-game Selections, if a Caster from the Empire of Sonnstahl either selects the Hereditary Spell or gains it by any other means, it must instead choose a single Path of Magic from the ones available to it other than its chosen Path. The Caster gains the Apprentice Spell(#1) from that Path as a Learned Spell.

eos-death_warrant.title: Death Warrant
eos-death_warrant.def: +X Att, +X Str, and +X AP, where X is the number of friendly Parent Units and Support Units of Height 1 (including the bearer’s unit if applicable) Engaged in the same Combat as the wielder.

eos-hammer_of_witches.title: Hammer of Witches
eos-hammer_of_witches.def:
Afflict(-1 Channel).
After determining the number of hits, a single hit (chosen by the attacker) has its Strength and Armour Penetration multiplied by two, and gains Multiple Wounds(2).

eos-imperial_seal.title: Imperial Seal
eos-imperial_seal.def: +1 Dis; Armour is set to 6. Fearless.

eos-blacksteel.title: Blacksteel
eos-blacksteel.def: +1 Arm, and if the wearer is without Mount, it gains an additional +1 Arm. Immune(Flaming Attacks).

eos-banner_of_unity.title: Banner of Unity
eos-banner_of_unity.def: Whenever the bearer’s unit is targeted by an Order, it may immediately give that same Order (for free) to up to two Support Units within 8" (of itself).

eos-marksmans_pennant.title: Marksman’s Pennant
eos-marksmans_pennant.def: The bearer’s unit gains Stand and Shoot.

eos-locket_of_sunna.title: Locket of Sunna
eos-locket_of_sunna.def:
When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, choose one enemy Character in contact with the wearer’s unit. Choose a model part on the chosen Character, it suffers: -2 Att, -2 Off, -2 Str, and -2 AP.
Duration: Round of Combat.

eos-winter_cloak.title: Winter Cloak
eos-winter_cloak.def: The bearer gains Aegis(3+, against Flaming Attacks),Aegis(5+),Distracting(1), and automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.

eos-exemplars_flame.title: Exemplar’s Flame
eos-exemplars_flame.def: The bearer can cast Corruption of Tin (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell(5+).

eos-ullors_horn.title: Ullor’s Horn
eos-ullors_horn.def: Enemy units within 8" of the bearer lose the Charging Momentum Agility bonus as well as the +1 Combat Score bonus from Charging.

eos-scroll_of_conquest.title: Scroll of Conquest
eos-scroll_of_conquest.def: Friendly units within 6" of the bearer must reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

he-rebirth.title: Rebirth
he-rebirth.def:
When the model loses its last Health Point, unless it is a Summoned model, the owner must roll a D6.
It succeeds on 5+:
  • Before removing the model as a casualty, mark the centre of its final position.
  • At the start of the next friendly Movement Phase, Summon a new Phoenix within 3" of the marked point.
The Summoned model has the same upgrades as the original Phoenix.
Immediately after being Deployed, the model loses 4 Health Points, which cannot be prevented or Recovered in any way.
If the roll fails, the model is removed as a casualty as normal.

he-fire_phoenix.title: Fire Phoenix
he-fire_phoenix.def:
The Phoenix model part gains Flaming Attacks,Grind Attack(D6, Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Unmodifiable), Sweeping Attack(XD3*+1, Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks).
* X is the number of Ranks in the targeted unit.

he-frost_phoenix.title: Frost Phoenix
he-frost_phoenix.def: The model gains Supernal, Fearless,Magical Attacks, Afflict(-2 Def, -2 Off, and -2 Agi).

he-wardens_bond.title: Warden’s Bond
he-wardens_bond.def:
The model gains +1 Discipline, Disciplined, and passes its Rebirth roll on 3+ instead of 5+.
The Phoenix model part gains Mount, in addition, the model gains an additional model part:

he-master_of_spellcrafting.title: Master of Spellcrafting
he-master_of_spellcrafting.def: The Wizard’s Learned Spells have their Casting Value reduced by 1, to a minimum Casting Value of 6.

he-valiant.title: Valiant
he-valiant.def: A unit containing Valiant automatically passes Panic Tests caused by Terror.

he-dragonforged_armour.title: Dragonforged Armour
he-dragonforged_armour.def:
Height 1--4 only.
The wearer gains Resistance(Flaming Attacks),Aegis(6+).

he-lions_fur.title: Lion’s Fur
he-lions_fur.def: If the model is without Mount, it gains +1 Arm, which is improved to +2 Arm against Shooting Attacks.

he-fae_miasma.title: Fae Miasma
he-fae_miasma.def:
Can only be used with Longbows and Paired Weapons.
When a unit suffers one or more wounds from attacks with Fae Miasma (before any saves are taken), all models in the unit suffer a -1 to-hit modifier (both for Shooting Attacks and Melee Attacks) with Duration: One Turn.

he-moonlight_arrows.title: Moonlight Arrows
he-moonlight_arrows.def:
Can only be used with Longbows without Weapon Enchantments.
The attack gains Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, and its Strength is set to 4.

he-sword_sworn.title: Sword Sworn
he-sword_sworn.def: Melee Attacks with a Great Weapon ignore Distracting, Parry.

he-elven_bolt_thrower.title: Elven Bolt Thrower
he-elven_bolt_thrower.def:
This Shooting Weapon can be fired in two ways:

Elven Bolt Thrower - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Elven Bolt Thrower348"1310Area Attack(1×5), Direct Hit(Str 6, Multiple Wounds(D3))


Elven Bolt Thrower - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Elven Bolt Thrower348"642

he-honour.title: Honour
he-honour.def: The model part gains Devastating Charge(+2 Att), and its unit’s Charge Range rolls gain Maximised.

he-master_of_canreig_tower.title: Master of Canreig Tower
he-master_of_canreig_tower.def:
The model gains Master of Spellcrafting, Protean Magic(3).

The model has these Paths of Magic available: Alchemy, Cosmology, Druidism, Evocation, Shamanism, Witchcraft.

he-queens_cavalier.title: Queen’s Cavalier
he-queens_cavalier.def:
The model part gains First Strike(+1 Att, +1 Off) and the model’s unit may reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

If the model has Height 5, Regal Dragon and Ancient Dragon replace their Ancient Allies(2) with Ancient Allies(1), and Phoenix replace Ancient Allies(1) with Ancient Allies(2).

he-fleet_officer.title: Fleet Officer
he-fleet_officer.def:
The model gains Strider(Water), Resolute(+1). The model part also gains Lightning Attacks and, if using a Longbow, Stand and Shoot.

Unless the model is Shaken, Panic Tests taken by friendly units containing Elf within 12" of this model are Minimised.

he-grandmaster_of_the_sword.title: Grandmaster of the Sword
he-grandmaster_of_the_sword.def: The model gains , Lethal Strike, First Strike(+1 Def, +1 Off), Sword Sworn.

he-high_warden_of_the_flame.title: High Warden of the Flame
he-high_warden_of_the_flame.def: The model gains Aegis(4+), Fearless, Stubborn.

he-queens_companion.title: Queen’s Companion
he-queens_companion.def:
The model’s Longbow Shots are set to 3, and the model’s unit gains Accurate.

Must choose (one option only):
•Fae Miasma, Scout,

Exclusive(Grey Watchers): free

•Moonlight Arrows: 10

he-royal_huntsman.title: Royal Huntsman
he-royal_huntsman.def:
The model must take Great Weapon and cannot take Shield.

The model gains Lion’s Fur, Valiant, and the model part gains Multiple Wounds(2, towards Height 4--5).

he-asfad_scholar.title: Asfad Scholar
he-asfad_scholar.def:
The model gains Channel(1).

The Range of the Wizard’s Learned Spells is increased by 6".
Aura spells gain +3" Range instead, while spells with type Caster are unaffected.

he-order_of_the_fiery_heart.title: Order of the Fiery Heart
he-order_of_the_fiery_heart.def:
The model gains Flaming Attacks, Metal Armour, and the model part’s Armour is set to 2.

The model replaces its available Paths of Magic with Alchemy, Pyromancy, and ignores the Missile, Damage spell types for Learned Spells when targeting units that are Engaged in Combat with itself.

he-ancient_allies.title: Ancient Allies
he-ancient_allies.def:
Units marked Ancient Allies count toward this category.The sum of the 1 per 1500 Army Points (rounding fractions up)
For example, at 4000 Army Points the Army List is restricted to Ancient Allies(3).
values stated in brackets of all models in the army is restricted to .

he-favour_of_meladys.title: Favour of Meladys
he-favour_of_meladys.def:
=1pt
The target gains 2 Protection Tokens, which are removed when the spell ends.
When a friendly unit within 18" of the target suffers a wound, after Armour Saves have been taken, but before any Special Saves are taken, the target may discard a Protection Token and ignore the wound applying the following rules:

  • Rank-and-File models of Height 1 ignore up to 2 wounds per token (provided they are suffered simultaneously).
  • Characters, and models of Height 4 or 5, can each only ignore a single wound per phase.
  • Wounds from attacks with Multiple Wounds are not ignored, they inflict one less wound instead.

he-nova_flare.title: Nova Flare
he-nova_flare.def:
Devastating Charge(+1 Att), Lethal Strike, Divine Attacks.
One use only. May be used when Choosing Equipment and Abilities: the wielder counts as Charging for the purpose of Devastating Charge with duration: Round of Combat.

he-sliver_of_the_blazing_dawn.title: Sliver of the Blazing Dawn
he-sliver_of_the_blazing_dawn.def:
+1 Str, +2 AP.
Each successful to-hit roll with this weapon causes two hits instead of one.

he-cadarons_heartwood.title: Cadaron’s Heartwood
he-cadarons_heartwood.def: Shots 3, Str as user +1, AP as user +1.

he-elemental_blade.title: Elemental Blade
he-elemental_blade.def:
+1 Att, +1 Str.

When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, choose to gain either Flaming Attacks, Lightning Attacks. Duration: Round of Combat.

he-gleaming_robe.title: Gleaming Robe
he-gleaming_robe.def:
Aegis(3+).
The wearer’s Armour is set to 1 and can never be improved beyond this.
If the wearer Miscasts and rolls Witchfire, the number of hits are halved (rounding fractions up) for the wearer and its unit.

he-protection_of_dorac.title: Protection of Dorac
he-protection_of_dorac.def:
+3 Def, +3 Arm, and Attached.
The model’s Armour can never be improved beyond 5.

he-star_metal_alloy.title: Star Metal Alloy
he-star_metal_alloy.def:
+1 Arm, which is improved to +2 Arm for models without Mount.
The bearer can never be wounded on a roll better than 3+.

he-navigators_banner.title: Navigator’s Banner
he-navigators_banner.def: The bearer’s unit gains First Strike(Aegis(5+)).

he-banner_of_becalming.title: Banner of Becalming
he-banner_of_becalming.def: In each of the opponent’s Magic Phases, immediately after Excess Magic, the opponent must discard 1 Magic Dice.

he-war_banner_of_rym.title: War Banner of Rymâ
he-war_banner_of_rym.def:
A unit with one or more War Banners of Rymâ gains +1" Cha.

In addition, Rank-and-File model parts with Elf in the unit gain Devastating Charge(+1 Str).

he-book_of_meladys.title: Book of Meladys
he-book_of_meladys.def: The first time in each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell cast with two or three Magic Dice, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice.

he-scroll_of_the_pearl_throne.title: Scroll of the Pearl Throne
he-scroll_of_the_pearl_throne.def:
Choose a Magic Item from an enemy unit that is in contact with the bearer. This Magic Item is ignored.

If it was an Enchanted Weapon or Enchanted Shield, the mundane effects of the Weapon or Shield can still be used.

he-amethyst_crystal.title: Amethyst Crystal
he-amethyst_crystal.def: Unless the bearer is Shaken, Dispelling Rolls made by the bearer’s army gain a +1 modifier; if the target of an enemy spell is within 18" of the bearer, that modifier is increased to +2.

he-sky_reaper.title: Sky Reaper
he-sky_reaper.def:
Sky Reaper - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Sky Reaper324"453Quick to Fire

koe-hooded_men.title: Hooded Men
koe-hooded_men.def: The model gains Hard Target(1), Skirmisher.

koe-champion_of_the_green_knight.title: Champion of the Green Knight
koe-champion_of_the_green_knight.def:
Extraordinary

The Fey Rider model part gains a Bastard Sword. Place a Forest* underneath the model until the model is removed as a casualty.
This Forest always extends up to the edges of the model’s Unit Boundary (and no further), even if the unit moves or changes formation.
* You may place a marker next to the unit instead.

koe-chosen_of_the_snow_childe.title: Chosen of the Snow Childe
koe-chosen_of_the_snow_childe.def:
- Attack Attribute

Extraordinary

When performing its Standard Melee Attacks, the Fey Rider model part gains +1 Att for each enemy model in contact with it; moreover, its Standard Melee Attacks ignore Parry.

Extraordinary

When performing its Standard Melee Attacks, the Fey Rider model part gains +1 Att for each enemy model in contact with it; moreover, its Standard Melee Attacks ignore Parry.

koe-warden_of_the_hooded_man.title: Warden of the Hooded Man
koe-warden_of_the_hooded_man.def:
Extraordinary

The model gains Terror.
The Fey Rider model part gains a Lance, and its Standard Melee Attacks gain Multiple Wounds(2, against Height 4--5).

koe-traits_of_a_hero.title: Traits of a Hero
koe-traits_of_a_hero.def: The Folk Hero must choose 1 or 2 different Heroic Traits.

koe-the_quest.title: The Quest
koe-the_quest.def:
During Pre-game Selections, an army containing The Quest a unit entry from the opponent’s Army Book, which cannot be a Character mount (but can be a Character Entry).
All instances of the Unit Entry in the opponent’s Army List are marked with a Quest Marker.
Model parts with The Quest Lethal Strike(against units containing a Quest Marker), Zeal(against units containing a Quest Marker).

koe-solemn_oath.title: Solemn Oath
koe-solemn_oath.def: The restriction on the maximum number of Proper Ranks for Rank Bonus purposes from Lance Formation is increased to four for the model’s unit.

koe-braziers.title: Braziers
koe-braziers.def: In each Shooting Phase, before selecting its target, a unit containing Braziers may choose to gain Flaming Attacks(Shooting). Duration: One Phase.

koe-stalwart_defence.title: Stalwart Defence
koe-stalwart_defence.def: Enemy units in Contact with the model lose Devastating Charge.

koe-knights_forlorn.title: Knights Forlorn
koe-knights_forlorn.def: the model gains Nobility and Bastard Sword.

koe-ordo_wardens.title: Ordo Wardens
koe-ordo_wardens.def: the model gains Clergy and Great Weapon.

koe-castle_guard.title: Castle Guard
koe-castle_guard.def: the model gains Commonfolk and Spear.

koe-forest_guide.title: Forest Guide
koe-forest_guide.def: The model’s unit gains Magical Attacks, Strider(Forest).

koe-sacred_relic.title: Sacred Relic
koe-sacred_relic.def:
A unit containing Sacred Relic gains Fight in Extra Rank.
In addition, when the unit is the target of an Orison while Engaged in Combat, add one Blessing Token to your pool.Ignore this effect if a Character with the Faith Knightly Principle is part of the model’s unit.
The Sacred Reliquary model part gains all Weapons of the Rank-and-File models in the unit it is joined to with duration: Permanent.

koe-courtier_of_the_dusk.title: Courtier of the Dusk
koe-courtier_of_the_dusk.def:
Gallantry(1)
The model gains Wizard Conclave(2).
The unit selects its spells from the following:

koe-knight_banneret.title: Knight Banneret
koe-knight_banneret.def:
Uncommon.


A unit containing a Knight Banneret adds +1 to the Combat Score of its side.

In addition, it can take a single Banner Enchantment from the list of Army Specific Magic Items.

A unit containing a Knight Banneret adds +1 to the Combat Score of its side.

In addition, it can take a single Banner Enchantment from the list of Army Specific Magic Items.

koe-ordo_minister.title: Ordo Minister
koe-ordo_minister.def:
In each friendly Magic Phase before Casting and Dispelling Spells (Magic Phase, Step 5) each unit containing Ordo Minister may gain one of the following effects:

  • Raise 1 HP on a Rank-and-File Health Pool in the unit.

  • Discard 1 Blessing Token and Recover 1 HP on any model in the unit.

koe-prepared_position.title: Prepared Position
koe-prepared_position.def:
Uncommon

When Deploying the unit, you may place a Wall fully within 1" of the unit’s Front Facing, and not in contact with any other Terrain Features.
This Wall cannot be wider than 1", nor longer than 8".
It follows the normal rules for Walls, with the exception that it is Covering Terrain (Height 1) instead of Height 3.

When Deploying the unit, you may place a Wall fully within 1" of the unit’s Front Facing, and not in contact with any other Terrain Features.
This Wall cannot be wider than 1", nor longer than 8".
It follows the normal rules for Walls, with the exception that it is Covering Terrain (Height 1) instead of Height 3.

koe-sainted.title: Sainted
koe-sainted.def:
Legendary. Cannot be taken by the Battle Standard Bearer.

The model part gains +1 Att, and the model gains Fearless.
The model is always considered to be under the effect of all Orisons at the same time (i.e. Discipline set to 9, +2 Off, Aegis(5+), Magical Attacks, ignore Parry).

This does not prevent the model’s unit from being the target of an Orison, although the model itself does not benefit from this additional Orison.

The model part gains +1 Att, and the model gains Fearless.
The model is always considered to be under the effect of all Orisons at the same time (i.e. Discipline set to 9, +2 Off, Aegis(5+), Magical Attacks, ignore Parry).

This does not prevent the model’s unit from being the target of an Orison, although the model itself does not benefit from this additional Orison.

koe-nobility.title: Nobility
koe-nobility.def:
The model gains Aegis(5+, against no Armour Save*).

*This Aegis save can only be used against attacks where the model cannot take an Armour Save, or would automatically fail it.

koe-clergy.title: Clergy
koe-clergy.def: The model gains Aegis(5+, against Magical Attacks).

koe-commonfolk.title: Commonfolk
koe-commonfolk.def: The model gains Aegis(5+) while Engaged in the same Combined Combat as another friendly unit.

koe-bastard_sword.title: Bastard Sword
koe-bastard_sword.def: Counts as a Hand Weapon, with the following additional rules: +1 Str, Devastating Charge(+1 AP).

koe-bannerman.title: Bannerman
koe-bannerman.def: The model becomes the Battle Standard Bearer.

koe-quin.title: Quin
koe-quin.def:
The model is a Wizard Adept that chooses Witchcraft as its Path of Magic.

If without Mount, the model also gains Scout.

koe-minstrel.title: Minstrel
koe-minstrel.def: The model gains Musician and is a Wizard Apprentice that chooses Divination as its Path of Magic.

koe-cleric.title: Cleric
koe-cleric.def: The model gains Clergy, Ordo Minister, and Holy Vows, and loses Commonfolk.

koe-castellan.title: Castellan
koe-castellan.def: The bearer gains Captain, Commanding Presence(6", Commonfolk).

koe-excellence.title: Excellence
koe-excellence.def: The bearer gains Zeal, and any Melee Attacks it allocates towards a Character gains +2 AP.

koe-forbearance.title: Forbearance
koe-forbearance.def: When Using a Shield, the model gains Distracting(1).

koe-generosity.title: Generosity
koe-generosity.def:
The model gains Attached,Exclusive(Rank-and-File).

In addition, Rank-and-File models with Nobility in the unit that the bearer is Deployed in gain a Bastard Sword and Weapon Master. Duration: Permanent.

koe-justice.title: Justice
koe-justice.def:
