At the end of Agility Step 0, the model performs X additional Standard Melee Attacks, where X is equal to the number of HP losses suffered in the Round of Combat by Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit.
X can never be greater than 3.\
If the model is unable to perform the additional attacks granted by Justice, those attacks are lost.

koe-valour.title: Valour
koe-valour.def: The bearer gains Fearless, Multiple Wounds(2, towards Res 5 or more).

koe-honour.title: Honour
koe-honour.def: The model part gains Devastating Charge(+2 Att), and its unit’s Charge Range rolls gain Maximised.

koe-faith.title: Faith
koe-faith.def:
The bearer gains Fearless and Holy Vows.
Moreover, if its unit is the target of an Orison while Engaged in Combat, add one Blessing Token to your pool.

koe-the_blessing.title: The Blessing
koe-the_blessing.def:
Unit profiles in this Army Book contain an additional Characteristic: Aegis(Aeg). This gives the unit the model rule Aegis(X+), where X is the Aeg value.

Remember that lack of an Aeg value does not prevent a unit from being affected by Aegis modifiers.

koe-orisons.title: Orisons
koe-orisons.def:
During Pre-game Selections, a Kingdom of Equitaine army creates a pool of Blessing Tokens: one for each unit in your Army List with Holy Vows. There can never be more than 6 tokens in the pool.

In EACH Magic Phase, before Casting and Dispelling Spells (Magic Phase, Step 5), , Blessing Tokens can be used: discard a Token, choose a friendly unit, and grant one of the following Model Rules. All effects have Duration: One Turn.

  • Orison of Shielding: Aegis(5+).

  • Orison of Striking: +2 Off, Magical Attacks, and ignore Parry, model parts with Mount are not affected.

  • Orison of Discipline: Discipline set to 9.

No model can be affected by more than one of the above effects simultaneously unless specifically stated.
Applying an Orison to a model cancels any Orisons previously applied to it, unless specifically stated that it can be affected by them simultaneously.

koe-lance_formation.title: Lance Formation
koe-lance_formation.def:
A unit entirely with Lance Formation only needs to have three files to form Proper Ranks.

However, the unit is never considered to have more than one Proper Rank for the purpose of Rank Bonus.
Moreover, when in a unit that has exactly three files, each model part on a model with Lance Formation gains two instances of Fight in Extra Rank.

koe-breath_of_the_lady.title: Breath of the Lady
koe-breath_of_the_lady.def: Add 2 Blessing Tokens to your pool.

koe-divine_judgement.title: Divine Judgement
koe-divine_judgement.def: If the wielder successfully completes a Charge, apply the following: +2 Str, +2 AP, with Duration: End of Combat.

koe-tristans_resolve.title: Tristan’s Resolve
koe-tristans_resolve.def:
+1 Att, +1 AP.
After a successful to-hit roll, the bearer may discard one of the hits made with this weapon and choose an Enchanted Weapon carried by the model the attack was allocated against: at the end of the Agility Step all Weapon Enchantments on it are ignored and the weapon ceases to be an Enchanted Weapon. Duration: Permanent.

koe-uthers_mettle.title: Uther’s Mettle
koe-uthers_mettle.def:
+X Att, where X is equal to the number of ranks in a single enemy unit in contact with the wielder, up to a maximum of 4 (if in contact with multiple units, use the one with the most ranks).
These extra attacks can only be allocated against Rank-and-File models (if the attacks cannot be allocated against Rank-and-File models, they are lost).

koe-fortress_of_faith.title: Fortress of Faith
koe-fortress_of_faith.def: The wearer gains Holy Vows, and all Armour Save rolls of ‘1’ made by the wearer must be rerolled.

koe-oriflamme.title: Oriflamme
koe-oriflamme.def: The bearer’s unit gains Afflict(-1 Dis), Horror.

koe-banner_of_roland.title: Banner of Roland
koe-banner_of_roland.def:
The bearer’s unit gains Aegis(5+, against Ranged Attacks).

In addition, enemy units with Stand and Shoot cannot use this rule towards the bearer’s unit.

koe-castellans_crest.title: Castellan’s Crest
koe-castellans_crest.def:
One use only. May be activated immediately after failing a Charge Range roll with the bearer or the bearer’s unit in the Charge Phase: the bearer or bearer’s unit must reroll its failed Charge Range roll.
Other Characters Charging out of the bearer’s unit are not affected.

koe-relic_shroud.title: Relic Shroud
koe-relic_shroud.def: The bearer can cast Breath of the Lady (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell(5+).

koe-ladys_favour.title: Lady’s Favour
koe-ladys_favour.def:
One use only. May be activated when the bearer’s unit is chosen as the target of an Orison.
The bearer’s unit gains the effects of all Orisons (i.e Discipline set to 9, +2 Off, Aegis(5+), Magical Attacks, and ignore Parry), with Duration: One Turn.

koe-sacred_chalice.title: Sacred Chalice
koe-sacred_chalice.def:
The bearer gains Magic Resistance(1).
In addition, whenever its unit is the target of an enemy spell, it gains Channel(1) until the end of the following Magic Phase.

koe-black_knights_tonic.title: Black Knight’s Tonic
koe-black_knights_tonic.def: The first time the model suffers an unsaved wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds(X), it gains Immune(Multiple Wounds). Duration: One Phase.

koe-scorpion.title: Scorpion
koe-scorpion.def:
Scorpion
- Shooting Weapon


NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Scorpion448"1310Area Attack(1×5), Direct Hit(Str 6, Multiple Wounds(D3))


Trebuchet
- Shooting Weapon


NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Trebuchet448"173Artillery,Area Attack(2×2), Direct Hit(Multiple Wounds(2))

ok-freezing_aura.title: Freezing Aura
ok-freezing_aura.def: Enemy units within 12" of one or more Frost Mammoths suffer -3 Agi (to a minimum of 1).

ok-dengrais_ice_storm.title: Dengrai’s Ice Storm
ok-dengrais_ice_storm.def: The model can cast Clouded Sight (Witchcraft) as a Bound Spell (6+).

ok-animal_master.title: Animal Master
ok-animal_master.def: The model gains Commanding Presence(12", Sabretooth Tigers).

ok-wildheart.title: Wildheart
ok-wildheart.def:
Core limit is reduced to Min. 20%, and Mammoth Hunter becomes Common.
The Army List may not include: Great Khans, Khans, Bruisers, Bombardiers, Mercenary Veterans, Mercenary Gunners with Brace of Ogre Pistols, or Thunder Cannons.

ok-leader_of_the_pack.title: Leader of the Pack
ok-leader_of_the_pack.def:
The Mammoth Hunter’s base size is changed to 50×50 mm.
The model replaces Exclusive(Yetis) with Exclusive(Sabretooth Tigers).
While joined to a unit of Sabretooth Tigers, the unit gains Vanguard, loses Unruly, and the Mammoth Hunter counts as being of the same Height as the unit for the purposes of allocating Ranged Attacks.

ok-its_a_trap.title: It’s a Trap!
ok-its_a_trap.def:
When an enemy unit performs any of the following actions, it suffers 2D6 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, and Unmodifiable:
  •
  •
Resolve the hits at the end of the action that triggered them. No unit can be affected by It’s a Trap! more than once in each Player Turn (including from different units containing It’s a Trap!).

ok-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
ok-giant_see_giant_do.def:
During step 1.2 of Pregame Planning (Build an Army), choose one of the following model rules, and write your choice on the Army List:
  • First Strike(Fury)
  • Lethal Strike
  • Devastating Charge(+1 Str, +1 AP)

ok-big_brother.title: Big Brother
ok-big_brother.def: The model’s HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and the roll for the number of hits it does with its Stomp Attack is Maximised.

ok-giant_club.title: Giant Club
ok-giant_club.def:
- Melee Weapon

+1 Str, +1 AP.

+1 Str, +1 AP.

ok-mountain_hide.title: Mountain Hide
ok-mountain_hide.def: Attacks with Multiple Wounds (X) against the model halve their X value (rounding fractions up).

ok-touch_of_frost.title: Touch of Frost
ok-touch_of_frost.def: An enemy unit suffers -1 Agi (to a minimum of 1) for each unit containing Touch of Frost it is in contact with.

ok-iron_fist.title: Iron Fist
ok-iron_fist.def: +1 Arm against Melee Attacks, +1 Att, and Parry.

ok-brace_of_ogre_pistols.title: Brace of Ogre Pistols
ok-brace_of_ogre_pistols.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Brace of Ogre PistolsX24"242
Stand and Shoot, Quick to Fire, Counts as Paired Weapons in Combat

ok-hunting_spear.title: Hunting Spear
ok-hunting_spear.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Hunting SpearX12"1User +1User +1Quick to Fire, March and Shoot, Multiple Wounds(D3, towards Height 5)

ok-hoardmaster.title: Hoardmaster
ok-hoardmaster.def:
+1 Arm, Weapon Master, and may not take Weapon Enchantments.

In addition, the bearer gains the following weapons: Great Weapon, Halberd, Paired Weapons, Iron Fist.

ok-headhunter.title: Headhunter
ok-headhunter.def: At the end of any Round of Combat where the model caused a HP loss on enemy models, and did not break, roll a D6 on 3+, the model Recovers 1 HP.

ok-godspeaker.title: Godspeaker
ok-godspeaker.def:
Attached, Fearless.

The bearer’s unit gains Unstable (the model may join units without Unstable during Deployment despite having Unstable).

ok-firebrand.title: Firebrand
ok-firebrand.def:
Breath Attack(Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks), Flaming Attacks, Resistance(Flaming Attacks).
The model can cast Fireball (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell(3+) and automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.

ok-spinesplitter.title: Spinesplitter
ok-spinesplitter.def: The bearer gains Devastating Charge(+1 Att, +1 Str, +1 AP).

ok-rottenjaw.title: Rottenjaw
ok-rottenjaw.def:
Poison Attacks, Immune(Poison Attacks).
Friendly Kin-Eater units may reroll failed Ambush rolls while the bearer is on the Battlefield.

ok-scraplord.title: Scraplord
ok-scraplord.def:
Commanding Presence (12", Scrapling).
As long as the bearer is joined to a unit of Scraplings, its model counts as being of the same Height as its unit for the purposes of allocating Ranged Attacks.

ok-children_of_umi.title: Children of Umi
ok-children_of_umi.def: All Melee Attacks allocated against the target suffer -1 to wound.

ok-vipers_curse.title: Viper’s Curse
ok-vipers_curse.def:
Poison Attacks (Melee & Shooting).
Shots 4, Str 4, AP 2, and always hits on 4+.

It cannot benefit from Area Attack, Direct Hit.

ok-heartripper.title: Heart-Ripper
ok-heartripper.def: +1 AP, Lethal Strike, and always hits on at least 3+.

ok-ritual_bloodletter.title: Ritual Bloodletter
ok-ritual_bloodletter.def:
+1 Att.

While the wielder’s unit is Engaged in Combat, the wielder must reroll Magic Dice that roll ‘1’ for its Casting Rolls.

ok-wrestlers_belt.title: Wrestler’s Belt
ok-wrestlers_belt.def: +1 Arm, +1 Str, and Devastating Charge(+1 Arm).

ok-mammothhide_cloak.title: Mammoth-Hide Cloak
ok-mammothhide_cloak.def: +1 Arm. Attacks against the wearer can never have more than Str 5.

ok-aurochs_resilience.title: Aurochs Resilience
ok-aurochs_resilience.def:
+1 Res, and Mountain Hide.
The model automatically fails all Special Saves.

ok-banner_of_the_gyengget.title: Banner of the Gyengget
ok-banner_of_the_gyengget.def: The bearer’s unit gains First Strike(re-roll to-hit and to-wound rolls of ‘1’).

ok-pennant_of_the_great_grass_sky.title: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky
ok-pennant_of_the_great_grass_sky.def: The bearer’s unit’s Charge Range rolls gain Maximised, and its Flee Distance rolls gain Minimised.

ok-rampagers_chain.title: Rampager’s Chain
ok-rampagers_chain.def: The bearer gains Stomp Attack(D3+1), and all models in its unit must reroll failed to-wound rolls with Stomp Attack.

ok-hand_cannon.title: Hand Cannon
ok-hand_cannon.def:
Hand Cannon - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Hand Cannon512"353Accurate, March and Shoot, Stand and Shoot, Quick to Fire

ok-scratapult.title: Scratapult
ok-scratapult.def:
Scratapult - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Scratapult448"141Artillery, Area Attack(3×3), Lethal Strike

ok-thunder_cannon.title: Thunder Cannon
ok-thunder_cannon.def:
Thunder Cannon - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Thunder Cannon448"152Artillery, Area Attack(1×3), Direct Hit(Str 10, AP 4, Multiple Wounds(D3+1))

sa-rex.title: Rex
sa-rex.def: The model’s base size is changed to 100×150 mm and its HP are set to 8.

sa-closely_guarded.title: Closely Guarded
sa-closely_guarded.def: The model gains Attached, Exclusive(Caiman Elders, Tegu Guards, Tegu Warriors), Stand Behind, Strider, War Platform.

sa-guardian_patu.title: Guardian Patu*
sa-guardian_patu.def:
See Tegu Guards profile.

- Melee Weapon

Counts has a Hand Weapon with the following additional rules: +1 Str, +1 AP, and Agility is always 0.

Counts has a Hand Weapon with the following additional rules: +1 Str, +1 AP, and Agility is always 0.

sa-mentor.title: Mentor
sa-mentor.def: No more than two models with Mentor can ever be joined to the same unit.

sa-combat_artist.title: Combat Artist
sa-combat_artist.def: The model gains Attached, Exclusive(Skink Warriors), as well as Tooth and Claw. Its base size is changed to 40×40mm.

sa-combat_master.title: Combat Master
sa-combat_master.def: The model gains Attached, Exclusive(Tegu Warriors), Weapon Master, as well as Tooth and Claw, Halberd, Great Weapon.

sa-combat_legend.title: Combat Legend
sa-combat_legend.def:
The model gains Exclusive(Caiman Elders), Weapon Master, as well as Tooth and Claw, Halberd, Great Weapon.
While using a Melee Weapon without a Weapon Enchantment, add the following rules, depending on the weapon used:
  • Great Weapon: +2 Att, +1 to wound.
  • Halberd: +2 Att, Distracting(1).
  • Tooth and Claw: +3 Att.

sa-hunt_leader.title: Hunt Leader
sa-hunt_leader.def:
The model becomes an Attachable Model and gains Exclusive(Raptor Pack, Raptor Riders).
While the model is joined to a unit of Raptor Pack or Raptor Riders, the model gains Pack Hunter.
Model parts with Magnasaur in the model’s unit gain Fury.
No more than a single model with Hunt Leader can ever be joined to the same unit.

sa-corrosive_spitter.title: Corrosive Spitter
sa-corrosive_spitter.def:
One use only. Choose one of the effects below to apply with Duration: End of Turn.
All models in the unit must choose and activate the same effect simultaneously.
  • May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities.
The model gains Grind Attack(1, Str 2, AP 3, Unmodifiable); if it is in the second rank and not in contact with any enemy model, it can make the Grind Attack across models in the first rank directly in front of it.
  • May be activated in the Shooting Phase. The model gains the following Shooting Weapon:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Corrosive Spit16"223Accurate, March and Shoot

sa-master_strategist.title: Master Strategist
sa-master_strategist.def: While joined to a unit consisting entirely of Height 1 Skinks, the unit gains Feigned Flight, Vanguard.

sa-great_protector.title: Great Protector
sa-great_protector.def:
The model gains Exclusive(Tegu Warriors),War Platform and it loses Stubborn.
In addition, all Rank-and-File models in its unit gain Parry.

sa-venomous_fortress.title: Venomous Fortress
sa-venomous_fortress.def:
The model’s base size is changed to 60×100 mm and it gains 6 additional Skink Riders.
Exclusive(Tegu Warriors) is replaced with Exclusive(Skink Warriors, Skink Hunters).
Model parts with Skink in the bearer’s unit gain First Strike(Hatred), Poison Attacks.

sa-walking_mountain.title: Walking Mountain
sa-walking_mountain.def:
Enemy units do not gain any Combat Score bonus for fighting in the Flanks or the Rear of this model, and it can never be Surrounded.
The model cannot benefit from Cover.

sa-path_of_destruction.title: Path of Destruction
sa-path_of_destruction.def:
- Attack Attribute

This model part can allocate Stomp Attack onto Health Pools of Height 4 or less (rather than 1 or less).
If the model part’s Stomp Attack is allocated onto a Health Pool entirely with Height (3--4), the total number of hits is halved (rounding fractions up).

sa-spearback.title: Spearback
sa-spearback.def:
The model gains First Strike(Hatred) and the following Shooting Weapon:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Shoot Spikes312"452Stand and Shoot,Quick to Fire

sa-salamander.title: Salamander
sa-salamander.def: The model gains Resistance(Flaming Attacks), Breath Attack(Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks). This Breath Attack does not have: One use only.

sa-chameleon.title: Chameleon
sa-chameleon.def: The model gains Ambush(Battlefield Edge), Hard Target(1), Scout.

sa-communal_bond.title: Communal Bond
sa-communal_bond.def:
Courage and Command Tests taken by the model’s unit are Minimised, and may use the Discipline from other units within 8", following the rules below:


  • Choose a single model in the unit to take the test for the whole unit, as usual.

  • Determine the model with the highest Discipline value in any other friendly, non-Shaken unit within 8".

  • Set the Discipline value of the model chosen in step 1 above to the value determined in step 2.

sa-pack_hunter.title: Pack Hunter
sa-pack_hunter.def:
Units entirely with Pack Hunter must reroll failed Charge Range rolls if either or both of the following apply:


  • Its Charge is part of a Combined Charge.

  • Its Charge is Declared towards a unit that is already Engaged in Combat.

sa-enclave_wizard.title: Enclave Wizard
sa-enclave_wizard.def:
The model is a Wizard Apprentice with access to Druidism, Shamanism, Evocation. It can select its spells from the Apprentice Spell and Adept Spells (#1-#4) from its chosen Path. This replaces the normal rules for Spell Selection connected to being a Wizard Apprentice.


Evocation=evocation,Druidism=druidism,Shamanism=shamanism

sa-tooth_and_claw.title: Tooth and Claw
sa-tooth_and_claw.def: +1 Att, +1 to hit, Two-Handed. This weapon cannot be enchanted with Weapon Enchantments.

sa-poisoned_javelin.title: Poisoned Javelin
sa-poisoned_javelin.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Poisoned JavelinX12"1UserUserStand and Shoot, Poison Attacks,Quick to Fire

sa-magnetic_short_bow.title: Magnetic Short Bow
sa-magnetic_short_bow.def: Bow, Range set to 18", +1 to hit towards Metal Armour, AP set to 1.

sa-farseeing_mastery.title: Farseeing Mastery
sa-farseeing_mastery.def: Learned Spells cast by the model gain +6" Range (Aura Spells gain +3" Range instead).

sa-forbidden_mastery.title: Forbidden Mastery
sa-forbidden_mastery.def:
Select either Pyromancy,Occultism: the model knows two additional spells from the chosen Path, which must be selected from the Apprentice Spell and Adept Spells (#1--#4).
Casting Rolls for these spells suffer a -1 modifier.

sa-eternal_mastery.title: Eternal Mastery
sa-eternal_mastery.def: The model’s Casting Rolls for Learned Spells gains a +1 modifier.

sa-invasive_mastery.title: Invasive Mastery
sa-invasive_mastery.def:
Once per friendly Magic Phase, the model may choose a Learned Spell that was successfully cast by an enemy Wizard in the previous Magic Phase: the model knows the chosen spell, with duration: One Phase.
Hereditary Spells cannot be chosen.

sa-mystifying_mastery.title: Mystifying Mastery
sa-mystifying_mastery.def: Your first failed Dispelling Roll during each enemy Magic Phase must be rerolled.

sa-shoot_spikes.title: Shoot Spikes
sa-shoot_spikes.def: Range 12", Shots 4, Str 5, AP 2, Quick to Fire.

sa-span_classtextbfwalking_mountainspan.title: Walking Mountain
sa-span_classtextbfwalking_mountainspan.def:
Enemy units do not gain any Combat Score bonus for fighting in the Flanks or the Rear of this model, and it can never be Surrounded.
The model cannot benefit from Cover.

sa-span_classtextbfpath_of_destructionsp.title: Path of Destruction
sa-span_classtextbfpath_of_destructionsp.def:
This model part can allocate Stomp Attack onto Health Pools of Height 4 or less (rather than 1 or less).
If the model part’s Stomp Attack is allocated onto a Health Pool entirely with Height (3--4), the total number of hits is halved (rounding fractions up).

sa-monolith_of_vitalism.title: Monolith of Vitalism
sa-monolith_of_vitalism.def: The model gains Rally Around the Flag.

sa-suncatcher_crystal.title: Suncatcher Crystal
sa-suncatcher_crystal.def:
The model gains an additional model part:

& & & & & &
Suncatcher Crystal & 2& 3& 6& 3& 2& Flaming Attacks, Construct

sa-lodestone_shield.title: Lodestone Shield
sa-lodestone_shield.def: Friendly units within 8" of the model gain Aegis(5+, against Ranged Attacks).

sa-magnetic_great_bow.title: Magnetic Great Bow
sa-magnetic_great_bow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Magnetic Great Bow418"363Accurate, March and Shoot, Quick to Fire, +1 to hit towards Metal Armour

sa-carved_wisdom.title: Carved Wisdom
sa-carved_wisdom.def:
Select one of the following spells as a Bound Spell. It may not be changed during Pre-Game Selections.
Fate’s Judgement=free as Bound Spell(3+),
Molten Copper=free as Bound Spell(4+),
Swarm of Insects=free as Bound Spell(5+),
Touch of the Reaper=free as Bound Spell(3+),

sa-lodestone.title: Lodestone
sa-lodestone.def: When allocated towards a Health Pool with Metal Armour, the attack gains +1 to hit.

sa-astral_union.title: Astral Union
sa-astral_union.def: The target gains Regeneration(6+) and Regeneration(+1, max. 3+).

sa-glory_of_the_dawn_age.title: Glory of the Dawn Age
sa-glory_of_the_dawn_age.def: +1 Str and Lethal Strike; to-wound rolls of ‘6’ gain Multiple Wounds(2).

sa-serpents_nest_charm.title: Serpent’s Nest Charm
sa-serpents_nest_charm.def: Attack Value is set to 6, Poison Attacks.

sa-alchemical_arrows.title: Alchemical Arrows
sa-alchemical_arrows.def: Shots 4. All Magnetic Short Bows in the wielder’s unit have their Strength set to 4.

sa-koru_stone.title: Koru Stone
sa-koru_stone.def: The bearer’s unit gains Rally Around the Flag.

sa-obelisk_of_collaboration.title: Obelisk of Collaboration
sa-obelisk_of_collaboration.def: The bearer’s unit gains Pack Hunter.

sa-te_aupouri_smokestone.title: Te Aupouri Smokestone
sa-te_aupouri_smokestone.def: May be activated when a friendly unit fails a Break Test (after any rerolls): enemy units within 18" of the bearer have their Charge Range, Pursuit Distance, and Overrun Distance rolls Minimised, with Duration: One Phase.

sa-ancient_plaque.title: Ancient Plaque
sa-ancient_plaque.def: The first time each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell, it may reroll all Magic Dice for this Casting Roll, provided no other friendly Wizard has made a Casting Roll this Phase.

sa-stampede_resonator_crystal.title: Stampede Resonator Crystal
sa-stampede_resonator_crystal.def: May be activated at the start of any Charge Phase. Choose one friendly unit containing models with Height 4-5 within 18": the chosen unit loses Stomp Attack and gains Impact Hits(X), where X is equal to the amount of hits from its Stomp Attack (if a model already had Impact Hits, increase the number of hits by its amount of Stomp Attack instead).

se-dances_of_cenyrn.title: Dances of Cenyrn
se-dances_of_cenyrn.def:
When Choose Equipment and Abilities, a unit entirely with Dances of Cenyrn must choose one of the following Dances and gain its effects, with Duration: Round of Combat.
  •
  •
  •
  •
The unit cannot choose a specific Dance again until after one or both of the following has happened:
  • The unit is not Engaged in Combat.
  • The unit has chosen a different Dance.

se-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
se-meeting_of_minds.def: The model gains Tree Singing, and Shooting Attacks against it can never hit on a roll of better than 4+.

se-clearing_spirits.title: Clearing Spirits
se-clearing_spirits.def: The model gains Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Skirmisher.

se-heath_hunters.title: Heath Hunters
se-heath_hunters.def: The model gains Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Vanguard, as well as a Light Lance and a Sylvan Bow (3+).

se-heath_lancers.title: Heath Lancers
se-heath_lancers.def: The model gains a Shield and a Lance.

se-big_game_hunters.title: Big Game Hunters (Shooting)
se-big_game_hunters.def: The attack always wounds on at least 4+ when allocated towards a Health Pool with Height 5.

se-herald_of_sura.title: Herald of Sura
se-herald_of_sura.def: The model’s unit gains Magical Attacks, Strider.

se-the_forest_follows.title: The Forest Follows
se-the_forest_follows.def: During Pre-game Selections, you may place a single Forest on the Battlefield, so that it is not inside either Deployment Zone and not in contact with any other Terrain Feature. This Forest has the dimensions of a 10"×6" rectangle. In addition to the normal Forest rules, it is Dangerous Terrain(6+) instead of any other instance of Dangerous Terrain, and can never be chosen for Primary- or Secondary Objectives.

se-forest_dweller.title: Forest Dweller
se-forest_dweller.def: While the model’s unit is within 3" of a Forest, the model gains Stubborn. In addition, if the model’s unit already contains Stubborn, the unit is considered Steady when rolling Break Tests.

se-tree_singing.title: Tree Singing
se-tree_singing.def:
Once in your Magic Phase, immediately after Excess Magic, a single model with Tree Singing may move a Forest following the steps below. The owner may discard a Magic Dice to increase the range to the distances written in square brackets [X"].

  •
  •

se-elven_cloak.title: Elven Cloak
se-elven_cloak.def: Shooting Attacks allocated against a Health Pool with Elven Cloak can never hit on a roll of better than 4+.

se-forests_thorns.title: Forest’s Thorns
se-forests_thorns.def: The attack’s AP is set to at least 3. This can only be used with a Sylvan Bow.

se-impaling_roots.title: Impaling Roots
se-impaling_roots.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Impaling Roots312"D6+14
1
 Gnarled and Knotted, March and Shoot, Quick to Fire, ignores to-hit modifiers from Cover.


Gnarled and Knotted
If the target is within 3" of a Forest, use the Strength and Armour Penetration values in brackets.

se-shapeshifter.title: Shapeshifter
se-shapeshifter.def: The model gains +2" Cha and +2" Mob, as well as Solitary,Vanguard, Multiple Wounds(2, towards Height 4-5), Devastating Charge(Height is set to 3).

se-wild_hunter.title: Wild Hunter
se-wild_hunter.def:
The model gains Fearless,Frenzy,Light Troops,Unruly.

In addition, the model part gains Devastating Charge(+1 Att),Fury,Lethal Strike.

se-pathfinder.title: Pathfinder
se-pathfinder.def:
The model gains ,Forest’s Thorns,Scout, Stand and Shoot,Vanguard.
A Sylvan Bow wielded by the model has its Shots set to 3 if the wielder is a Chieftain with Captain, to 5 otherwise.

se-forest_guardian.title: Forest Guardian
se-forest_guardian.def:
The model gains Vanguard.

Moreover, the model, as well as Rank-and-File models in its unit, gains First Strike(Hatred).

se-blade_dancer.title: Blade Dancer
se-blade_dancer.def:
The model gains Aegis(6+), Dances of Cenyrn (see Blade Dancer unit),Exclusive(Blade Dancer Kindred, Blade Dancers),Fearless,Magic Resistance(1).

In addition, the model’s unit gains Swiftstride, Devastating Charge(Fly).

se-scarred_bark.title: Scarred Bark
se-scarred_bark.def: The model’s unit gains First Strike(Hatred).

se-entangling_vines.title: Entangling Vines
se-entangling_vines.def:
The model gains Impaling Roots (if it did not already have it).

In addition, the model gains the following model rule:

Duration: End of Combat. When Choosing Equipment and Abilities; choose one enemy Character model in contact with the wielder.
Melee Attacks from the chosen model must reroll successful to-hit rolls against the wielder.

se-toxic_spores.title: Toxic Spores
se-toxic_spores.def: The model’s unit’s Standard Melee Attacks gain Lethal Strike.

se-oaken_crown.title: Oaken Crown
se-oaken_crown.def: The wearer gains Disciplined, Magic Resistance(2).

se-verdant_rebirth.title: Verdant Rebirth
se-verdant_rebirth.def:
This model Recovers 1 HP the first time each Magic Phase that it successfully casts a Learned Spell targetting a friendly unit.

It cannot Recover more than 1 HP in total per Magic Phase from this spell or Fountain of Youth (Druidism).

se-sylvan_beasts.title: Sylvan Beasts
se-sylvan_beasts.def: The sum of the Sylvan Beasts values stated in brackets of all models in the army is restricted to 1 per 1500 Army Points (rounding fractions up).

se-gnarled_and_knotted.title: Gnarled and Knotted
se-gnarled_and_knotted.def: If the target is within 3" of a Forest, use the Strength and Armour Penetration values in brackets.

se-forest_embrace.title: Forest Embrace
se-forest_embrace.def:
Place a Forest* underneath the target until the last model in the unit is removed as a casualty. This Forest always extends up to the edges of the target’s Unit Boundary (even if the unit moves or changes formation).

* You may place a marker next to the unit instead

se-spirit_arrows.title: Spirit Arrows
se-spirit_arrows.def:
When attacking with this weapon, before rolling to hit; choose one model with Channel in the target unit.
The chosen model replaces its Channel(X) with Channel(X–1). Duration: One Turn.

se-bough_of_wyscan.title: Bough Of Wyscan
se-bough_of_wyscan.def: Number of Shots is always 1, Str 3, AP 2, Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit(Str 6, AP 4, Multiple Wounds(2)).

se-hunters_honour.title: Hunter’s Honour
se-hunters_honour.def:
+1 Str and +1 AP.

If the wielder causes at least one HP loss with this weapon, the wielder and all Rank-and-File models in its unit gain Distracting(1). Duration: Round of Combat

se-shielding_bark.title: Shielding Bark
se-shielding_bark.def:
+1 HP, Aegis(5+),Fearless, Tree Singing,Weakness(Flaming Attacks).

The Armour value is set to 4 and can never be improved beyond this.

se-banner_of_deception.title: Banner of Deception
se-banner_of_deception.def:
At the beginning of step 3.5 of Battle Preparations (Defender’s Advantage), the owner may remove the bearer’s unit from the Battlefield and redeploy it in a new formation following the usual restrictions.
Attached models remain Attached.

se-banner_of_silent_mist.title: Banner of Silent Mist
se-banner_of_silent_mist.def: The bearer’s unit gains Magic Resistance(1) and is always considered to be in Soft Cover.

se-predator_pennant.title: Predator Pennant
se-predator_pennant.def: The bearer’s unit gains Devastating Charge(Distracting(1)).

se-hail_shot.title: Hail Shot
se-hail_shot.def:
One use only. Duration: One Phase. May be activated in the Charge Phase or the Shooting Phase.

This is a Shooting Weapon with the following profile:
  •

Hail Shot cannot benefit from Forest’s Thorns.

se-mist_walkers_mirror.title: Mist Walker’s Mirror
se-mist_walkers_mirror.def:
One use only. May be activated at the end of any friendly Movement Phase if the bearer’s unit is Unengaged, consists entirely of Height 1 models, and is fully inside a Forest that is not in contact with any enemy model. Apply the following rules:
  • Remove the bearer’s unit from the Battlefield.
  • Immediately place it back using Ambush(centre of Forest).

If the unit cannot be placed, it is removed as a casualty where it was removed.

se-sacred_seeds.title: Sacred Seeds
se-sacred_seeds.def:
May be activated at the end of any friendly Movement Phase, if the bearer is Unengaged. Duration: Permanent.
Place a Forest, in contact with the bearer and at least 1" away from enemy units and other Terrain Features.
This Forest has the dimensions of a 10"×6" rectangle. It follows the normal Forest rules, except it is Dangerous Terrain(6+) instead of any other instance of Dangerous Terrain.

se-song_of_cenyrn.title: Song of Cenyrn
se-song_of_cenyrn.def:
May be activated when the bearer’s unit Declares a Charge. The target of the Charge can only declare Hold! as its Charge Reaction, unless it is Shaken.
The enemy unit may still declare Charge Reactions as normal if charged by other units.

se-horn_of_the_wild_hunt.title: Horn of the Wild Hunt
se-horn_of_the_wild_hunt.def: One use only. May be activated when a friendly unit within 8" fails a Charge Range roll. The Charge Range roll is rerolled.

se-poisoned_thorn.title: Poisoned Thorn
se-poisoned_thorn.def:
Poisoned Thorn - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Poisoned Thorn312"131Poison Attacks, Quick to Fire, Stand and Shoot

vc-lash_of_souls.title: Lash of Souls
vc-lash_of_souls.def: The model can cast Pentagram of Pain (Occultism) as a Bound Spell(3+).

vc-aura_of_undeath.title: Aura of Undeath
vc-aura_of_undeath.def:
During its Shooting Phase, the model part can make a Shooting Attack that targets all enemy units within 12" of the model (including those Engaged in Combat and outside Front Arc and/or Line of Sight).
This attack can be used even if the Altar is Engaged in Combat.
Each target suffers D6 hits with a Strength equal to the current Game Turn number, Armour Penetration 2, and Unmodifiable.

vc-no_rest_for_the_wicked.title: No Rest for the Wicked
vc-no_rest_for_the_wicked.def:
Friendly Rank-and-File models in units within 6" gain Regeneration(6+). In addition:
  • Ghasts gain Regeneration(4+).
  • Models from Core gain Regeneration(+1, max. 5+) in their First Round of Combat.

vc-soul_tether.title: Soul Tether
vc-soul_tether.def: The model can cast Arise! as a Bound Spell(5+), with the following changes: Range is set to 6", and it gains the Type: Aura.

vc-unnatural_activity.title: Unnatural Activity
vc-unnatural_activity.def: Friendly units within 6" of one or more models with Unnatural Activity gains +2 Off and +2 Agi.

vc-unholy_conduit.title: Unholy Conduit
vc-unholy_conduit.def: Friendly units within 6" of the model gain Autonomous.

vc-extended_chassis.title: Extended Chassis
vc-extended_chassis.def: The Dark Coach’s base size is changed to 50×150mm, and has Phantom Host (2).

vc-great_monstrous_revenant.title: Great Monstrous Revenant
vc-great_monstrous_revenant.def: The Monstrous Revenant gains Stomp Attack(D3) and its base size is changed to 60×100mm.

vc-lich.title: Lich
vc-lich.def:
If Height 1--4, the model gains Regeneration(5+).
When the model casts Arise!, it may choose to set the spell’s Range to 6" and give it the Type: Aura (this choice is declared when selecting targets).
In addition, the model has access to Cosmology in addition to its normal Paths.

vc-chilling_shriek.title: Chilling Shriek
vc-chilling_shriek.def:
When the model part allocates Attacks, it may choose to exchange all of its Standard Melee Attacks for a Grind Attack(HP*, Str 9, AP 10, Magical Attacks,Psychic Attacks,Unmodifiable)
*The number of hits is equal to the model’s current number of HP.

vc-ashes_to_ashes.title: Ashes to Ashes
vc-ashes_to_ashes.def:
At the end of each of your Player Turns, if there are no friendly models with Gates of the Netherworld on the Battlefield, each unit containing Ashes to Ashes loses X HP, where X is equal to half the Resurrected, value fractions are rounded up, (roll any dice when needed).
These hits can only be allocated onto models with Ashes to Ashes.

vc-gates_of_the_netherworld.title: Gates of the Netherworld
vc-gates_of_the_netherworld.def:
Uncommon. Must include at least 1.


  • If the model has chosen Evocation as its Path of Magic : whenever the model successfully casts the Hereditary Spell, all targets of the spell are considered to have +1 Rsr.

  • If the model has chosen a different path than Evocation as its Path of Magic : the model knows the Apprentice Spell (#1) in Evocation in addition to its other spells.

vc-awaken.title: Awaken
vc-awaken.def: The model can Raise Health Points above a unit’s starting size for the units stated within brackets (X). However, units cannot be increased beyond twice their starting size or beyond the unmodified maximum unit size (that is printed in their unit entry). A unit’s starting size is the size of the unit as written on the Army List or the size of the unit when it is Summoned.

vc-necromantic_aura.title: Necromantic Aura
vc-necromantic_aura.def: All friendly units within 6" of one or more models with Necromantic Aura reduce the number of HP losses caused by Ashes to Ashes, Unstable by 1.

vc-the_dead_arise.title: The Dead Arise
vc-the_dead_arise.def:
Legendary.

The model can cast The Dead Arise as a Bound Spell(5+).The Dead Arise: Range: 12", Type : Ground, Duration : Instant.
Summon a Skeletons or Zombies unit. Declare which when selecting the target. The unit has a number of Health Points corresponding to its Rsr. All upgrades except Command Group Options are allowed. Note: all models must be placed within the spell’s Range, with at least one model touching the target point.

vc-autonomous.title: Autonomous
vc-autonomous.def: Units entirely with Autonomous may perform March Moves as normal despite being Undead, even when outside the range of Commanding Presence of any friendly models.

vc-ghostly_form.title: Ghostly Form
vc-ghostly_form.def: The model gains Aegis(5+),Aegis(3+, against non-Magical Attacks).

vc-vampiric.title: Vampiric
vc-vampiric.def:
At the end of each Melee Phase, check and resolve the following effects for all models with Vampiric:
  • Character (or Attachable Model): if at least one attack with Vampiric made by the Character (or Attachable Model) caused any HP loss against enemy units, the model with Vampiric can make a single Vampiric roll.
If successful, the model Recovers a single HP.
  • Rank-and-File model: if at least one attack with Vampiric made by a Rank-and-File model in the unit caused any HP loss against enemy units, the unit can make a single Vampiric roll.
If successful, the unit Raises a single HP.
A Vampiric roll is successful if the D6 scores X+, where X is the number stated within brackets. If a unit or Character has multiple model parts with this Attack Attribute that each caused a HP loss, use the best value.

vc-unholy_appetite.title: Unholy Appetite
vc-unholy_appetite.def: After a Round of Combat in which at least one attack with Unholy Appetite caused any HP loss, all attacks with Unholy Appetite gain Hatred until the end of the next Player Turn.

vc-chilling_howl.title: Chilling Howl
vc-chilling_howl.def:
The number of shots is equal to the model’s current number of HP.

Chilling Howl - Shooting Weapon

Chilling HowlAuto8"HP*910March and Shoot, Magical Attacks, Hits Automatically,Psychic Attacks, Unmodifiable
* The number of shots is equal to the model’s current number of HP.

vc-sangreal.title: Sangreal
vc-sangreal.def: The model part gains +1 Arm and Fury.

vc-vetala.title: Vetala
vc-vetala.def: The bearer gains Disciplined, Unholy Conduit, Vampiric(4+), Awaken(Bat Swarms, Dire Wolves, Great Bats, Zombies).

vc-lahmia.title: Lahmia
vc-lahmia.def: The bearer’s Armour is set to 1, it gains Elven Finesse and loses Metal Armour. Additionally, if the model is of Height 1--2, it gains Distracting(1).

vc-strigoi.title: Strigoi
vc-strigoi.def: The bearer’s Armour is set to 0, its HP are set to 4, it gains First Strike(Hatred) and loses Metal Armour. Additionally, if it is without Mount, it gains Regeneration(4+).

vc-crimson_rage.title: Crimson Rage
vc-crimson_rage.def: The bearer gains Hatred, and its Vampiric rolls gain Maximised.

vc-storm_caller.title: Storm Caller
vc-storm_caller.def: All units within 12" of the bearer’s model gain Hard Target(1).

vc-commandment.title: Commandment
vc-commandment.def: The Defensive Skill and Offensive Skill of Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit are set to 6.

vc-ghoul_lord.title: Ghoul Lord
vc-ghoul_lord.def: The bearer and all Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit gain Poison Attacks.

vc-arcane_knowledge.title: Arcane Knowledge
vc-arcane_knowledge.def:
The bearer selects a second Path of Magic it knows one spell from this Path, in addition to its other spells, selected from the Apprentice Spell or Adept Spells (#1-#4), and is otherwise not allowed to choose spells from this Path.
Ignore this Path for the purpose of Gates of the Netherworld.

vc-eternal_duellist.title: Eternal Duellist
vc-eternal_duellist.def: The bearer’s Melee Attacks ignore Parry, and must re-roll to-hit and to-wound rolls of ‘1’.

vc-monster_hunter.title: Monster Hunter
vc-monster_hunter.def: The bearer gains Multiple Wounds(2, towards Height 4--5).

vc-unbreakable_will.title: Unbreakable Will
vc-unbreakable_will.def: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, select a single friendly unit Engaged in the same Combat as the bearer (this can be its own unit): this unit gains Stubborn. Duration: End of Turn.

vc-mesmerising_gaze.title: Mesmerising Gaze
vc-mesmerising_gaze.def:
The bearer gains Afflict(-1 Att, -1 Off).

Only Character models are affected by this instance of Afflict.

vc-bestial_bulk.title: Bestial Bulk
vc-bestial_bulk.def: The model’s Height is changed to 3, its base size is changed to 40×40mm, and it gains Stomp Attack(1), Attached(Ghasts, Vampire Spawn).

vc-flying_horror.title: Flying Horror
vc-flying_horror.def: The model gains +2" Cha, +2" Mob, Fly, Swiftstride.

vc-mysteries_of_the_night.title: Mysteries of the Night
vc-mysteries_of_the_night.def: The bearer’s Path access is replaced with Shamanism, Witchcraft.

vc-blood_magic.title: Blood Magic
vc-blood_magic.def:
The bearer cannot know the Hereditary Spell, or have it as a Bound Spell, in any way.
Each time the bearer successfully casts a Learned Spell, you may discard one Magic Dice to successfully cast Arise!, targeting only the bearer’s unit.

vc-arise.title: Arise!
vc-arise.def:
Choose one of the following effects, for each target:
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.

  • One model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.

The following models cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this spell each Magic Phase:


  • Height 4--5 models with Solitary.

  • Characters and models with War Platform.

vc-reapers_harvest.title: Reaper’s Harvest
vc-reapers_harvest.def: Strength set to 10, Armour Penetration set to 10, Divine Attacks,Psychic Attacks.

vc-true_thirst.title: True Thirst
vc-true_thirst.def:
+1 Str, +1 AP, Unholy Appetite, Vampiric(3+).

If the wielder’s model has Height 4 or 5 , the wielder gains Vampiric(5+) instead of Vampiric(3+).

vc-black_standard_of_zagvozd.title: Black Standard of Zagvozd
vc-black_standard_of_zagvozd.def: Melee Attacks made by Rank-and-File model parts without Mount in the bearer’s unit gains +1 to-hit.

vc-banner_of_eldritch_might.title: Banner of Eldritch Might
vc-banner_of_eldritch_might.def:
Each turn, if the unit has been a target of at least one successfully cast friendly spell it gains Fight in Extra Rank with Duration: One Turn.

In addition, during your Magic Phase, all spells targeting only the bearer’s unit gain a +1 modifier to their Casting Rolls.

vc-hypnotic_pendant.title: Hypnotic Pendant
vc-hypnotic_pendant.def: The wearer and all Rank-and-File models with Height 1--2 in its unit gain Parry.

vc-eternity_gem.title: Eternity Gem
vc-eternity_gem.def: The bearer’s model gains Immune(Lethal Strike). When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds(X), reduce the number of wounds suffered by 1, to a minimum of 1.

vc-necromantic_staff.title: Necromantic Staff
vc-necromantic_staff.def: The wielder gains Channel(1), and can cast Arise! (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell(5+), with the following changes : Range is set to 6", and it gains the Type: Aura.

vc-nights_crown.title: Night’s Crown
vc-nights_crown.def: Attacks against the bearer suffer -1 to-wound.

vc-cursed_medallion.title: Cursed Medallion
vc-cursed_medallion.def:
During Pre-game Selections, choose a single model unit on the opponent’s Army List (remember: all Characters are single model units).

The wearer gains Hatred(chosen model), Zeal(chosen model).

vc-wail_of_woe.title: Wail of Woe
vc-wail_of_woe.def:
Wail of Woe - Shooting Weapon

Wail of WoeAuto8"D6+241March and Shoot,Unmodifiable, Magical Attacks, Hits Automatically

ud-sacred_ark.title: Sacred Ark
ud-sacred_ark.def: Learned Spells cast by friendly Wizards within 12" of one or more models with Sacred Ark gain +6" Range (Aura spells gain +3" Range instead).

ud-curse_of_phatep.title: Curse of Phatep
ud-curse_of_phatep.def: Spells cast by this unit gains +12" Range.

ud-scales_of_destiny.title: Scales of Destiny
ud-scales_of_destiny.def:
-



The model gains Hierophant and Wizard Apprentice with access to Cosmology, Divination, Evocation.

ud-death_is_only_the_beginning.title: Death is Only the Beginning
ud-death_is_only_the_beginning.def:
Each time this model successfully casts a Learned Spell of Type Augment, Universal, choose one of the following effects, for a single targeted friendly unit:
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises a number of HP equal to its Resurrected value.
  • A single model in the target Recovers a number of HP equal to its Resurrected value.
This effect cannot be applied more than twice on the same Health Pool in each Magic Phase.

ud-soul_conduit.title: Soul Conduit
ud-soul_conduit.def:
The model gains Hierophant.
In addition, if the model’s chosen Path of Magic is:
  • Evocation: whenever the model casts a Spell of Type Augment, Universal on a friendly unit, you may activate Death is Only the Beginning on any friendly unit within 18" of the model instead of one of the units the spell was cast on.
  • Any other Path of Magic: the model knows Whispers of the Veil (Evocation) in addition to its other spells.

ud-deathless_noble.title: Deathless Noble
ud-deathless_noble.def: The model gains Undying Will, Disciplined.

ud-tomb_harbinger.title: Tomb Harbinger
ud-tomb_harbinger.def:
The model part gains Fury, Lethal Strike.
In addition, it counts as a Rank-and-File model for the purposes of Undying Will.

ud-tomb_architect.title: Tomb Architect
ud-tomb_architect.def: At the beginning of step 3.5 of the Battle Setup (Defender’s Advantage), and at the start of each friendly Player Turn, choose a friendly unit containing Statue within 18": all models with Statue gains Regeneration(5+). Duration: One Turn.

ud-commander_of_the_terracotta_army.title: Commander of the Terracotta Army
ud-commander_of_the_terracotta_army.def:
The model gains Terracotta Army, and a Pharaoh must be the General.
Other units in the Army List must be upgraded with Terracotta Army.

ud-lord_of_the_barrow_legion.title: Lord of the Barrow Legion
ud-lord_of_the_barrow_legion.def:
The model gains Barrow Legion, and a Pharaoh must be the General.
Other units in the Army List must be upgraded with Barrow Legion.

ud-ghastly_swarm.title: Ghastly Swarm
ud-ghastly_swarm.def: The model’s Resurrected value is set to 1, and it gains Spirit, Aegis(5+), Aegis(3+ against non-Magical Attacks), Ghost Step, Magical Attacks,and loses Skirmisher, Hard Target(1).

ud-eternal_guardian.title: Eternal Guardian
ud-eternal_guardian.def: Attacks with Multiple Wounds(X) against the model halve the number of wounds they inflict (rounding fractions up).

ud-chariot_of_nephetr.title: Chariot of Nephet-Râ
ud-chariot_of_nephetr.def: The model’s base size is changed to 100×100 mm, it gains two additional Skeletal Horse model parts, as well as Solitary, Fly.

ud-hierophant.title: Hierophant
ud-hierophant.def: An Undying Dynasties army must include at least a single model with Hierophant.

ud-dust_to_dust.title: Dust to Dust
ud-dust_to_dust.def:
At the end of each of your Player Turns, if there are no friendly models with Hierophant on the Battlefield, each unit containing Dust to Dust loses X HP, where X is equal to half their Resurrected value (rounding fractions up).

These hits can only be allocated onto models with Dust to Dust.

ud-ensouled_statue.title: Ensouled Statue
ud-ensouled_statue.def: Units entirely with Ensouled Statue reduce by 1 the number of HP lost due to Dust to Dust, Unstable.

ud-undying_will.title: Undying Will
ud-undying_will.def:
Rank-and-File model parts with Skeleton in units containing Undying Will gain +2 Def, +2 Off, Magical Attacks,Lethal Strike, and replace their Shooting Weapons’ Aim with (4+).

Model parts with Mount are not affected by Undying Will.

ud-autonomous.title: Autonomous
ud-autonomous.def: Units entirely with Autonomous may perform March Moves as normal despite being Undead, even when outside the range of the Commanding Presence of any friendly models.

ud-barrow_legion.title: Barrow Legion
ud-barrow_legion.def:
Unless the model has Height 5, or only has model parts with Beast and/or Statue, it gains +1 Arm, Metal Armour, and loses Light Armour (if it has it).
A model with Mount cannot benefit from this +1 Arm more than once.

If an army includes any model with Barrow Legion, then all models in the Army List must have Barrow Legion.

ud-terracotta_army.title: Terracotta Army
ud-terracotta_army.def:
Models without Statue have their Rsr set to 1, gain +1 Res, Statue, Ensouled Statue, and lose Dust to Dust.

If an army includes any model with Terracotta Army, then all models in the Army List must have Terracotta Army.

ud-aspis_arrows.title: Aspis Arrows
ud-aspis_arrows.def: The model’s Shooting Weapon always hits on a roll equal to or greater than its Aim.

ud-great_aspis_bow.title: Great Aspis Bow
ud-great_aspis_bow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Great Aspis BowX36"152Aspis Arrows,Shoot in Extra Rank.

ud-charnel_catapult.title: Charnel Catapult
ud-charnel_catapult.def:
If this weapon causes any HP loss, the target must immediately take a Panic Test.

Charnel Catapult - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Charnel Catapult448"173Artillery, Area Attack(2×2), Direct Hit(Multiple Wounds(2))
.
If this weapon causes any HP loss, the target must immediately take a Panic Test.

ud-petrifying_gaze.title: Petrifying Gaze
ud-petrifying_gaze.def:
To-wound rolls are set to 5+.

Petrifying Gaze - Shooting Weapon

Petrifying GazeAuto12"2*10Stand and Shoot, Hits Automatically, Unmodifiable,
* To-wound rolls are set to 5+.

ud-godslayer.title: Godslayer
ud-godslayer.def:
+1 Att, Divine Attacks, Multiple Wounds(2, towards Aegis(X+)*).

*Note that the latter also applies towards models with Aegis Saves with conditional applications.

ud-scourge_of_kings.title: Scourge of Kings
ud-scourge_of_kings.def: Attack Value is set to 6, Zeal(towards Characters).

ud-banner_of_the_entombed.title: Banner of the Entombed
ud-banner_of_the_entombed.def:
-1. The bearer counts towards Entombed.

If taken by a Character, the bearer gains Ambush(Open Terrain).

If taken by a Rank-and-File model, the bearer’s unit gains Ambush(Open Terrain), and additional models cannot be added to the unit during Army List creation.

ud-crown_of_the_pharaohs.title: Crown of the Pharaohs
ud-crown_of_the_pharaohs.def:
At the start of every friendly Player Turn, the wearer may lose Undying Will.
If so, choose a friendly unit within 12": this unit gains Undying Will, with Duration: One Turn.

ud-sacred_hourglass.title: Sacred Hourglass
ud-sacred_hourglass.def: The first time each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell that was targeting a friendly unit, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice for this Casting Roll.

ud-book_of_the_dead.title: Book of the Dead
ud-book_of_the_dead.def:
The bearer can cast a unique Bound Spell:
Unfinished Duty: Casting Value (4+), Range 12", Aura, Augment. Duration: Instant.
Choose one of the following effects for each target:
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises a number of HP equal to its Resurrected value.

  • One model in the target Recovers a number of HP equal to its Resurrected value.

ud-kherp_sceptre.title: Kherp Sceptre
ud-kherp_sceptre.def:
The wielder gains Hierophant.
In addition, the wielder can cast Danse Macabre (Evocation) as a Bound Spell(5+).

ud-blessed_wrappings.title: Blessed Wrappings
ud-blessed_wrappings.def: The wearer gains +1 HP and loses one instance of Weakness(Flaming Attacks).

ud-icon_of_reflection.title: Icon of Reflection
ud-icon_of_reflection.def:
One use only. You may activate this Banner Enchantment when a spell is successfully cast on the bearer’s unit: immediately duplicate the effect of the spell on another friendly unit within 6" of the bearer’s unit, as it had also been successfully cast on this unit following the spells normal targeting restrictions, except Range.

This does not trigger Death is Only the Beginning on the second unit.

ud-sigil_of_the_closed_gates.title: Sigil of the Closed Gates
ud-sigil_of_the_closed_gates.def: The bearer’s unit gains +1 Mob and Ghost Step.

ud-sandstorm_cloak.title: Sandstorm Cloak
ud-sandstorm_cloak.def: The wearer’s Mobility is set to 8, and gains Autonomous, Fly, Sweeping Attack(2D6, Str 2, AP 1).

ud-scroll_of_desiccation.title: Scroll of Desiccation
ud-scroll_of_desiccation.def:
During Pre-game Selections, choose a Field, Forest, Water Terrain, that has not been placed during Pre-game selections: it ceases to be the Terrain Feature it used to be and loses its Terrain Rules.
It becomes a Desert Terrain Feature with Dangerous Terrain(6+) for all enemy units.

ud-giant_aspis_bow.title: Giant Aspis Bow
ud-giant_aspis_bow.def:
Giant Aspis Bow - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Giant Aspis Bow448"1310Area Attack(1×5), Direct Hit(Str 6, Multiple Wounds(D3)),Aspis Arrows

vs-underworld_beast.title: Underworld Beast
vs-underworld_beast.def:
The model gains Random Movement(3D6"), and its Attack Value is set to 4D3.
It loses the Pitmaster model part, and its base size is changed to 60×100 mm.

vs-gladius.title: Gladius
vs-gladius.def:
- Attack Attribute

The model gains +1 Str when using a Hand Weapon.

The model gains +1 Str when using a Hand Weapon.

vs-bloodfur_praetorians.title: Bloodfur Praetorians
vs-bloodfur_praetorians.def:
The model gains Bodyguard (General), a Great Weapon, and loses Halberd.
The model does not count towards the army’s cap of max. 120 Blackfur Veteran models.

vs-unstable_engines.title: Unstable Engines
vs-unstable_engines.def: Immediately before the model is removed as a casualty, it inflicts D6 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Unmodifiable on all units, other than its own, within 6" of the model’s unit.

vs-unit_of_artillery.title: Unit of Artillery
vs-unit_of_artillery.def: If one model in this unit is affected by an Engineer, all Rank-and-File models in this unit are affected by the Engineer.

vs-fire_rats.title: Fire Rats
vs-fire_rats.def:
The model gains Flaming Attacks, Weakness(Flaming Attacks), and its base size is changed to 25×50 mm.
Immediately before the model is removed as a casualty as a result of a enemy Melee Attack, it inflicts 1 hit with Str 3, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Unmodifiable towards the Health Pool of the attacking model.

vs-fetthis_fleshmaster.title: Fetthis Fleshmaster
vs-fetthis_fleshmaster.def: The Charge Range rolls of units entirely with Mutant within 12" one or more Fetthis Fleshmaster gains Maximised.

vs-stygian_overseer.title: Stygian Overseer
vs-stygian_overseer.def:
Ambush(Terrain Feature with a friendly Tunnel Marker),Tunnel Digger.
In addition, each Stygian Overseer on the Army List increases the duplication limit of Legionary Drill Teams by 1.

vs-rakachit_technocrat.title: Rakachit Technocrat
vs-rakachit_technocrat.def: The model gains Engineer(Experimental Weapon Teams, Vermin Artillery).

vs-skorchit_alchemist.title: Skorchit Alchemist
vs-skorchit_alchemist.def:
Height 1 Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit gain
First Strike(Zeal, Flaming Attacks).

vs-plague_flail.title: Plague Flail
vs-plague_flail.def:
- Melee Weapon

Halberd. The wielder gains Devastating Charge(Lethal Strike),Afflict(-1 Def)

Halberd. The wielder gains Devastating Charge(Lethal Strike),Afflict(-1 Def)

vs-imperator.title: Imperator
vs-imperator.def: Other friendly within units range of the model’s Commanding Presence gain Fearless, Unstable, and lose Life is Cheap,Maniacal Enthusiasm.

vs-girded_by_acratos.title: Girded by Acratos
vs-girded_by_acratos.def: The model's Armour is set to 4, it gains Magic Resistance(2) and Metal Armour.

vs-enlightened_by_favana.title: Enlightened by Favana
vs-enlightened_by_favana.def:
The model replaces Wizard Apprentice with Wizard Adept, and can choose Witchcraft,Thaumaturgy instead of Occultism.
The model cannot take Paired Weapons, Halberd, Great Weapon.

vs-fortified_by_udius.title: Fortified by Udius
vs-fortified_by_udius.def: The model gains Regeneration(4+), Hard Target(1).

vs-pestilent_pulpit.title: Pestilent Pulpit
vs-pestilent_pulpit.def:
The model gains Diseased, Exclusive(Plague Cultists, Plague Disciples).
The model’s unit gains Poison Attacks.
The Chassis model part’s Agility is set to 4 and it gains Grind Attack(D3+1), Devastating Charge(+10 Agi).

vs-whispering_bell.title: Whispering Bell
vs-whispering_bell.def:
The model gains , Musician, Exclusive(Blackfur Veterans, Bloodfur Praetorians, Vermin Legionaries), and the Chassis Model part gains Impact Hits(D3+1)
Increase the number of ignored Health Points due to Life is Cheap by two in Combats where at least one friendly unit with Life is Cheap is within 12" of the Whispering Bell.
Remember that Unit Boundaries are frozen until after taking Break Tests.

vs-cutting_corners.title: Cutting Corners
vs-cutting_corners.def: The model selects one spell less than normal.

vs-tracking_telescope.title: Tracking Telescope
vs-tracking_telescope.def: The model gains +1 to hit towards targets with Hard Target that are at Long Range.

vs-cannon_fodder.title: Cannon Fodder
vs-cannon_fodder.def: Shooting Attacks towards enemy units in contact with one or more models with Cannon Fodder gain +1 to hit.

vs-callous.title: Callous
vs-callous.def:
The model may use Shooting Attacks towards enemy units Engaged in Combat, with the following rules and restrictions:
  • Friendly units Engaged in this Combat are ignored for Cover purposes (but not for drawing Line of Sight).
  • Roll to-hit as normal against the intended target. Immediately after determining the number of hits, roll a D6 for each hit. On a roll of 4+, the hit is distributed onto a randomly chosen friendly unit Engaged with the original target. Otherwise, proceed as normal.

vs-drill_down.title: Drill Down!
vs-drill_down.def:
One use only. May be activated at the end of a friendly Movement Phase, if:


  • The model's unit, with the exception of the model itself, consists entirely of Height 1 models.

  • The model's unit was allowed to move in the current Phase. (is not Shaken, Fail Charged, Unengaged etc.).


Effect:

  • Remove the model's unit from the Battlefield
  • The model's unit gains Ambush(Terrain Feature with a friendly Tunnel Marker).

It automatically passes any Ambush Rolls.

vs-life_is_cheap.title: Life is Cheap
vs-life_is_cheap.def:
When calculating Combat Score, ignore the first two Health Point losses of Health Pools with Life is Cheap in each Round of Combat.

Note: the number of ignored Health Point losses is not affected by the amount of Health Pools.

Units containing Life is Cheap that are both Steady and Solid get +2 Discipline when taking Break Tests.

vs-cohort_coordination.title: Cohort Coordination
vs-cohort_coordination.def:
While the unit has a Standard Bearer and the General is on the Battlefield, it:


  • Gains Fight in Extra Rank.

  • May reroll a failed Command Test. If it chooses to do this, and still fails the test, the unit loses Standard Bearer, and you must remove one Rank-and-File model from the unit as a casualty (no saves allowed).

vs-diseased.title: Diseased
vs-diseased.def: Whenever a ‘1’ is rolled to hit for an enemy Melee Attack allocated towards a model with Diseased, the model part inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks on the attacking model’s unit in the same Agility Step, before any casualties are removed.

vs-maniacal_enthusiasm.title: Maniacal Enthusiasm
vs-maniacal_enthusiasm.def:
When models in a unit make a dice roll of the type defined in brackets (X), after seeing the result(s) of all simultaneous rolls for X, and rolling eventual re-rolls, it may add 2 to X for all simultaneous rolls with this attribute.

If this modifier is used, immediately roll a D6 and consult the table below:

  • 1--2 Oops: Change the target of all simultaneous Attacks or a spell with Maniacal Enthusiasm to a friendly unit within range chosen by the controlling player (the model’s own unit is always an eligible target).

  • 3--4 Room for Improvement: After fully resolving the simultaneous attacks or a spell that triggered the roll on this table, the model’s unit suffers 3 hits with Str 4, AP 10 and Unmodifiable.

  • 5--6 Glorious Success!: No additional effect.

vs-canister_launcher.title: Canister Launcher
vs-canister_launcher.def:
6.

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Canister LauncherX18"1310Artillery, Area Attack (3×3), Toxic Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-hit roll), Quick to Fire


Canister Launcher
Only one model per unit may use a Canister Launcher in any one Shooting Phase.

Increase the Aim of the Canister Launcher by 1 for each other model in the unit armed with a Canister Launcher.


Only one model per unit may use a Canister Launcher in any one Shooting Phase.

Increase the Aim of the Canister Launcher by 1 for each other model in the unit armed with a Canister Launcher.

vs-deepfire_thrower.def:
6.

Only one model per unit may use a Deepfire Thrower in any one Shooting Phase.

Increase the Aim of the Deepfire Thrower by 1 for each other model in the unit armed with a Deepfire Thrower.


The model gains Weakness(Flaming Attacks).

Only one model per unit may use a Deepfire Thrower in any one Shooting Phase.

Increase the Aim of the Deepfire Thrower by 1 for each other model in the unit armed with a Deepfire Thrower.

vs-rotary_gun.def:
12.

Rotary GunX18"D642Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-hit roll), Quick to Fire

vs-plague_disciples.title: Plague Disciples
vs-plague_disciples.def: The unit replaces its Bloodpox Blades with Plague Flail.

vs-i_am_the_senate.title: I am the Senate
vs-i_am_the_senate.def: When calculating Combat Score for Combats containing one or more friendly unit within 12" of a Ruinous Dictator, your side adds +1 to their Combat Score.

vs-lord_of_the_legions.title: Lord of the Legions
vs-lord_of_the_legions.def: The model’s Standard Melee Attacks gains Multiple Wounds(D3).

vs-pontifex_maximus.title: Pontifex Maximus
vs-pontifex_maximus.def: The model may take (and pay the price for) one item from Artefacts or Potions and Scrolls, worth up to 50 pts, that is normally available to Vermin Swarm Characters.

vs-sling.title: Sling
vs-sling.def:
Attacks made at Long Range have their Str set to 3

Sling - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Sling418"140Quick to Fire, Attacks made at Long Range have their Str set to 3

vs-deepfire_grenades.title: Deepfire Grenades
vs-deepfire_grenades.def:
When shooting at an enemy unit Engaged in Combat (using the Callous rule), hits are distributed onto a randomly chosen friendly unit Engaged with the original target on a roll of 5+ instead of 4+.

Deepfire Grenades - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Deepfire Grenades58"262Accurate, Flaming Attacks, Quick to Fire, Deepfire Grenades


Deepfire Grenades

When shooting at an enemy unit Engaged in Combat (using the Callous rule), hits are distributed onto a randomly chosen friendly unit Engaged with the original target on a roll of 5+ instead of 4+.

vs-darkstone_generator.title: Darkstone Generator
vs-darkstone_generator.def:
Darkstone Generator - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Darkstone GeneratorAuto12"D3+1D6+13March and Shoot, Lightning Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-wound roll),Unmodifiable, Automatic Hits

vs-iovanis_thunder.title: Iovanis’ Thunder
vs-iovanis_thunder.def: The target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks,Magical Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-wound roll).

vs-swarm_master.title: Swarm Master
vs-swarm_master.def: While using this weapon, the wielder gains Grind Attack(X, Str 3, AP 1,Unmodifiable), where X is the number of Proper Ranks in the wielder’s unit, up to a maximum of 10.

vs-secrets_of_the_doom_blade.title: Secrets of the Doom Blade
vs-secrets_of_the_doom_blade.def:
+1 Att, +2 AP. Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-wound roll),Multiple Wounds(D3).

Rolls this model makes on the Maniacal Enthusiasm chart gain a +2 modifier.

vs-storm_rocket.title: Storm Rocket
vs-storm_rocket.def:
Aim 3+, Range 24", Str 5, AP 2, Flaming Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-hit roll).
If the weapon hits, it causes D6 hits instead of 1.

vs-bell_of_the_deep_roads.title: Bell of the Deep Roads
vs-bell_of_the_deep_roads.def: The bearer’s unit gains Ambush(Terrain Feature with a friendly Tunnel Marker).

vs-sacred_aquila.title: Sacred Aquila
vs-sacred_aquila.def:
The bearer and Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit gain Fury.

In addition, for each to-hit roll of ‘1’ with a Melee Attack made by the bearer or a Rank-and-File model in its unit, the bearer’s unit suffers 1 hit with Str 3, AP 0 and Unmodifiable at the end of the Agility Step in which this effect is triggered.

vs-plaguehermits_blessing.title: Plague-Hermit’s Blessing
vs-plaguehermits_blessing.def: The model’s number of HP is set to 6, it gains the Cult of Errahman property, and automatically fails all its Armour Saves rolls.

vs-scepter_of_the_usurper.title: Scepter of the Usurper
vs-scepter_of_the_usurper.def:
The bearer’s unit gains Fearless.

If the General is removed as a casualty, the bearer becomes the General.

vs-crown_of_hubris.title: Crown of Hubris
vs-crown_of_hubris.def: Duration: One Phase. At the start of any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer may choose to inflict 3 HP losses on its unit. If this is done, the model gains Channel(2).

vs-tarinas_lyre.title: Tarina’s Lyre
vs-tarinas_lyre.def: Any Stomp Attack made by enemy units within 8" of the bearer suffers a -2 to-wound modifier.

vs-darkstone_detonator.title: Darkstone Detonator
vs-darkstone_detonator.def:
At the end of any friendly Movement Phase after the first, the bearer may remove all friendly Tunnel Markers placed on a single Terrain Feature within 24" of the bearer.
If so, one Unengaged unit in contact with that Terrain Feature suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4, AP 1, and Unmodifiable.

vs-favanite_powder.title: Favanite Powder
vs-favanite_powder.def: When casting a Hex spell, after seeing the result of the roll, the bearer can choose to gain Maniacal Enthusiasm(Casting Roll).

vs-potion_of_rat_form.title: Potion of Rat Form
vs-potion_of_rat_form.def: During any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer can choose to lose Attached (if they had it) and make a 6" Magical Move. It must end this move by joining another friendly unit (following the normal rules for joining units).

vs-skorchit_ordnance.title: Skorchit Ordnance
vs-skorchit_ordnance.def:
Skorchit Ordnance - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Skorchit Ordnance548"141Artillery, Flaming Attacks, Area Attack(3×3)


Rakachit Mauss Rifle - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Rakachit Mauss Rifle548"152Artillery, Lightning Attacks, Area Attack(1×3), Direct Hit(Str 10, AP 4, Multiple Wounds(D3+1))

dh-runic_anvil.title: Runic Anvil
dh-runic_anvil.def:
The model must select three different Battle Runes. Note which spells are selected on the Army List.
The Range of these spells is set to 36".
The model cannot cast Bound Spells in the same Player Turn that it performed a Move Manoeuvre.

dh-monster_seeker.title: Monster Seeker
dh-monster_seeker.def:
The model gains Multiple Wounds(2, towards Height 3--5).
In addition, when a unit containing this rule Charges a unit containing a model with Height 3-5, its Charge Range roll gains Maximised.

dh-grim_resolve.title: Grim Resolve
dh-grim_resolve.def:
The model gains +1 Att for each enemy model in contact with it.
In addition, when a unit containing this rule Charges a unit containing a model with Height 0-2, its Charge Range roll gains Maximised.

dh-flaming_shot.title: Flaming Shot
dh-flaming_shot.def:
- Attack Attribute -- Shooting

The model’s Shooting Attacks become Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks.

The model’s Shooting Attacks become Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks.

dh-rune_crafted.title: Rune Crafted(X)
dh-rune_crafted.def: • Dwarf Ballista: +1 to hit towards Fly  • Flame Cannon: +1 AP  • Dwarf Catapult: +1 Str, +2 AP  • Dwarf Cannon: Direct Hit(Str 10, AP 4, Multiple Wounds(D3+2)) towards Height 5  • Organ Gun: +1 to wound

dh-runic_engravings.title: Runic Engravings
dh-runic_engravings.def:
During Pre-game Selections, each Hold Guardians unit must choose one of the following effects, with Duration: Permanent .
  • +1 Str, +1 AP.
  • +3 Agi, Vanguard.

dh-kingsoath.title: Kingsoath
dh-kingsoath.def:
The model part gains +1 Att.
The extra Melee Attack resulting from Kingsoath can only be allocated towards targets in a unit containing a Grudge Marker.

dh-crag_warden.title: Crag Warden
dh-crag_warden.def: The model gains Hard Target(1), Light Troops,Skirmisher.

dh-rune_craft_mastery.title: Rune Craft Mastery
dh-rune_craft_mastery.def: Melee Attacks from models in a unit containing Rune Craft Mastery gain +1 AP.

dh-brothers_of_vengeance.title: Brothers of Vengeance
dh-brothers_of_vengeance.def: The model gains Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Skirmisher.

dh-shrapnel_grenades.title: Shrapnel Grenades
dh-shrapnel_grenades.def: One use only. Duration: One Phase. Can be activated in the Movement Phase: when activated, the model gains Sweeping Attack(D3, Str 3, AP 1).

dh-shrapnel_bombs.title: Shrapnel Bombs
dh-shrapnel_bombs.def: The model gains Sweeping Attack(2D6, Str 3, AP 1).

dh-whirling_chains_of_doom.title: Whirling Chains of Doom
dh-whirling_chains_of_doom.def:
- Melee Weapon



+1 Str, +1 AP, and always Agi 10.

dh-shield_wall.title: Shield Wall
dh-shield_wall.def: Models of Height 1--3 using a Hand Weapon and a Shield simultaneously gain Aegis(6+, against Melee Attacks from models Engaged in their Front Facing), as well as Aegis(5+, against Melee Attacks from Charging models Engaged in their Front Facing).

dh-dwarf_catapult.title: Dwarf Catapult
dh-dwarf_catapult.def: The model’s Height is changed to 3.

dh-rune_of_revocation.title: Rune of Revocation
dh-rune_of_revocation.def:
Ignore all other spell effects on the target from spells with Duration: One Turn.
The target unit gains Magic Resistance(2), which is also applied to friendly spells.

dh-rune_of_reckoning.title: Rune of Reckoning
dh-rune_of_reckoning.def:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Hatred.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Hatred.

dh-rune_of_oaths.title: Rune of Oaths
dh-rune_of_oaths.def:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Zeal.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Zeal.

dh-rune_of_resolve.title: Rune of Resolve
dh-rune_of_resolve.def:
The target gains Swiftstride and, until the end of the Player Turn, it also gains Light Troops.
In addition, the target may immediately perform a 4" Magical Move.

dh-rune_of_resilience.title: Rune of Resilience
dh-rune_of_resilience.def: To-wound rolls against the target suffer a -1 modifier.

dh-honour.title: Honour
dh-honour.def: The model part gains Devastating Charge(+2 Att), and its unit’s Charge Range rolls gain Maximised.

dh-hewn_out_of_mountains.title: Hewn Out of Mountains
dh-hewn_out_of_mountains.def: The player of this army has a +1 modifier on Dispel Rolls, as long as at least one friendly model with Channel(X) is on the Battlefield.

dh-ancient_grudge.title: Ancient Grudge
dh-ancient_grudge.def:
During Pre-game Selections, a Dwarven Holds army marks units on the opponent’s Army List with Grudge Markers (note that Characters can be marked, too).
The number of Grudge Markers placed is equal to the number of instances of Ancient Grudge on units in your Army List.
All model parts with Dwarf in your army gain First Strike(Hatred(towards units containing a Grudge Marker)).

dh-runic_weapon_enchantments.title: Runic Weapon Enchantments
dh-runic_weapon_enchantments.def:
Runic Weapon Enchantments follow the rules for Weapon Enchantments, with the following differences:
  • All Runic Weapon Enchantments are enchantments for Hand Weapons and Paired Weapons.
  • Up to 3 Runic Weapon Enchantments can be applied to a single weapon.
  • Each combination of Runic Weapon Enchantments is Legendary.
  • Multiple instances of the same Runic Weapon Enchantment are cumulative, unless mentioned otherwise.
  • When noting Runes on the Army List, use the following format: Runic Weapon (Rune A, Rune B, Rune C).

dh-rune_of_smashing.title: Rune of Smashing
dh-rune_of_smashing.def: Attacks allocated towards a model with Resilience 5 or more have both their Strength and their Armour Penetration set to 10.

dh-rune_of_craftsmanship.title: Rune of Craftsmanship
dh-rune_of_craftsmanship.def:
The weapon follows the rules for Great Weapon instead of its original Weapon Rules.

This does not prevent it from being engraved with additional Runic Weapon Enchantments.

dh-rune_of_lightning.title: Rune of Lightning
dh-rune_of_lightning.def:
Grind Attack(D3, Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks,Magical Attacks, Unmodifiable).

A model with two instances of this Rune increases the number of hits to 2D3.
Note that these hits are not affected by the effects of other Runic Weapon Enchantments.

dh-rune_of_returning.title: Rune of Returning
dh-rune_of_returning.def: Can be used as a Shooting Weapon with the following profile: Range 8", Shots 1, Str , AP , Quick to Fire,Accurate, The effects of other Runic Weapon Enchantments apply to Shooting Attacks made with this weapon (even if their effects were normally restricted to Melee Attacks, including Special Attacks).

dh-rune_of_fire.title: Rune of Fire
dh-rune_of_fire.def:
When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, the wielder may gain Flaming Attacks.
Duration: Round of Combat.

dh-runic_armour_enchantments.title: Runic Armour Enchantments
dh-runic_armour_enchantments.def:
Runic Armour Enchantments follow the rules for Armour Enchantments with the following differences:
  • Up to 3 Runic Armour Enchantments can be applied to a model.
  • Each combination of Runic Armour Enchantments is Legendary.
  • Multiple instances of the same Runic Armour Enchantment are cumulative, unless specifically mentioned otherwise.
  • When noting Runes on the Army List, use the following format: Runic Armour (Rune A, Rune B, Rune C).

dh-rune_of_steel.title: Rune of Steel
dh-rune_of_steel.def: Must reroll failed Armour Save rolls.

dh-rune_of_retribution.title: Rune of Retribution
dh-rune_of_retribution.def: When rolling a successful Aegis Save from Shield Wall, the model inflicts a hit with the same Strength and Armour Penetration as the attack that was saved, towards the Health Pool of the model that caused the wound (this occurs before any casualties are removed; these hits do not benefit from Weapon Rules or Runic Weapon Enchantments).

dh-runic_artefacts.title: Runic Artefacts
dh-runic_artefacts.def:
Runic Artefacts follow the rules for Artefacts with the following differences:
  • Up to 3 Runic Artefacts can be applied to a model.
  • Each combination of Runic Artefacts is Legendary.
  • Multiple instances of the same Runic Artefact are cumulative, unless specifically mentioned otherwise.
  • When noting Runes on the Army List, use the following format: Runic Artefact (Rune A, Rune B, Rune C).

dh-rune_of_denial.title: Rune of Denial
dh-rune_of_denial.def:
One use only.

The player may choose to use this Rune instead of performing a Dispelling Roll. The spell is automatically dispelled.

dh-rune_of_devouring.title: Rune of Devouring
dh-rune_of_devouring.def:
One use only. The player may choose to use this Rune instead of performing a Dispelling Roll.

The spell is cast as normal, but the Caster may not cast it again for the rest of the game.

dh-rune_of_dragons_breath.title: Rune of Dragon’s Breath
dh-rune_of_dragons_breath.def: Breath Attack(Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks).

dh-rune_of_harnessing.title: Rune of Harnessing
dh-rune_of_harnessing.def: In each of your opponent’s Magic Phases, immediately after Excess Magic, they must discard 1 Magic Dice.

dh-rune_of_courage.title: Rune of Courage
dh-rune_of_courage.def:
One use only. Duration: Round of Combat.
May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities. The bearer gains Stubborn.

dh-rune_of_grounding.title: Rune of Grounding
dh-rune_of_grounding.def:
One use only. May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities.
All spells with Duration: One Turn that affect any of the following units come to an end:
  • The bearer’s unit.
  • Enemy units in contact with the bearer’s unit.

dh-rune_of_readiness.title: Rune of Readiness
dh-rune_of_readiness.def:
One use only. May be activated at the end of the Charge Phase, immediately after all Charge Moves have been resolved.
If the bearer’s unit was successfully charged during this Phase, it may perform a Combat Reform (following the normal rules for Combat Reforms).

dh-rune_of_storms.title: Rune of Storms
dh-rune_of_storms.def:
One use only. Duration: End of Turn.
May be activated at the start of the opponent’s Player Turn.
Choose a single enemy unit within 24" of the bearer.
The Charge Speed and Mobility of all models with Fly in that unit are halved, rounding fractions up.

dh-rune_of_shielding.title: Rune of Shielding
dh-rune_of_shielding.def: Aegis(+1, max. 4+), which can only stack with itself and Shield Wall.

dh-rune_of_channeling.title: Rune of Channeling
dh-rune_of_channeling.def:
Channel(1).
This Rune can only be used if the model’s army total combined value for Channel is 3 or less (excluding Channel from this Rune).

dh-rune_of_mining.title: Rune of Mining
dh-rune_of_mining.def:
During Pre-game Selections, choose a Terrain Feature on the Battlefield.
As long as the bearer is on the Battlefield, all friendly models may treat this Terrain Feature as Open Terrain when making a Move Manoeuvre (Reform, Advance or March Move), but must still follow the Unit Spacing rule at the end of their move.

dh-rune_of_kinship.title: Rune of Kinship
dh-rune_of_kinship.def: The bearer gains Ambush(Battlefield Edge), Scout, Vanguard.

dh-runic_banner_enchantments.title: Runic Banner Enchantments
dh-runic_banner_enchantments.def: Dwarven Holds armies may use Banner Enchantments from the list of Common Banner Enchantments as well as the Runic Banner Enchantments listed below.

dh-runic_standard_of_dismay.title: Runic Standard of Dismay
dh-runic_standard_of_dismay.def: Charge Range rolls against the bearer’s unit gain Minimised.

dh-runic_standard_of_steadiness.title: Runic Standard of Steadiness
dh-runic_standard_of_steadiness.def:
One use only. Duration: End of Turn. May be activated at the start of any Movement Phase.
The bearer’s unit loses Unwieldy.

dh-runic_standard_of_the_anvil.title: Runic Standard of the Anvil
dh-runic_standard_of_the_anvil.def: Whenever a friendly unit Charges an enemy unit already Engaged in Combat with the bearer’s unit and fails its Charge Range roll, it must reroll that roll.

dh-runic_standard_of_wisdom.title: Runic Standard of Wisdom
dh-runic_standard_of_wisdom.def:
Select a single Battle Rune and write it on your Army List.
This Battle Rune can be cast by the bearer as a Bound Spell.
It can only target the bearer’s own unit.

dh-runic_standard_of_the_hold.title: Runic Standard of the Hold
dh-runic_standard_of_the_hold.def: All models in the bearer’s unit gains Resolute(+1).

dh-forge_gun.title: Forge Gun
dh-forge_gun.def:
Forge Gun - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Forge Gun318"140March and Shoot, Flaming Attacks, Stand and Shoot,Always hits on 3+

wdg-deeds_not_words.title: Deeds not Words
wdg-deeds_not_words.def:
- Attack Attribute

The model part gains Fury, Hatred while joined to one or more Rank-and-File models with Human.
