custom-netted.title: Netted
custom-netted.def: Units Netted one or more times suffer -1 Strength and -1 Armour Penetration until the end of the Round of Combat.

custom-standard.title: Standard
custom-standard.def: Standard does not grant additional Model Rules

custom-infantry.title: Infantry
custom-infantry.def: Infantry does not grant additional Model Rules

custom-construct.title: Construct
custom-construct.def: The model cannot use  and has

custom-close_combat_attacks.title: Close Combat Attacks
custom-close_combat_attacks.def:
Model parts perform a number of Close Combat Attacks equal to their Attack Value.
Special Attacks are considered to be Melee Attacks that are not Close Combat Attacks (see Special Attacks)

custom-clipped_wings.title: Clipped Wings
custom-clipped_wings.def:
If Clipped Wings is stated after the X value in brackets, any unsaved wound caused by the attack against a model
with is multiplied into X+1 instead of X.

custom-guiding_digestive_vomit.title: Guiding Digestive Vomit
custom-guiding_digestive_vomit.def:
If a model with Digestive Vomit is on on the winning side of a Combat, it gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

Duration: Permanent.

custom-guiding_mirrored_scales.title: Guiding Mirrored Scales
custom-guiding_mirrored_scales.def: Each Melee Attack allocated against the model that rolls a ‘1’ to hit, is instead allocated to the attacking model’s Health Pool with Automatic Hits.

custom-guiding_segmented_shell.title: Guiding Segmented Shell
custom-guiding_segmented_shell.def: Attacks with Multiple Wounds(X) against the model reduce their X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

custom-general.title: General
custom-general.def:
An army may include a General, and this upgrade is One of a Kind.

A General gains Commanding Presence

id-fullSteamAhead.title: Full Steam Ahead!
id-fullSteamAhead.def: Abazzalem cannot choose to Pursue, unless he is Charging –– in which case he must Pursue (including Overrun).

id-theRiddleOfPeace.title: The Riddle of Peace
id-theRiddleOfPeace.def:
During Pre-game Selections, select a single Character on the opponent’s Army List.
Any unit containing the selected Character suffers from Minimised(Charge Range Roll).

he-asfadaHeadmaster.title: Asfada Headmaster
he-asfadaHeadmaster.def: Instead of selecting spells, (including Universal Swapping) the Asfada Headmaster knows Cosmology: #1, #2, #3, #5, Divination: #1, #2, #3, and #5. Note: He can still Hereditary Swap.

he-commanderOfTheVeil.title: Commander of the Veil
he-commanderOfTheVeil.def: Acadnath gains the following Magic Items: Obsidian Rock, Potion of Power Preservation, Scroll of Power. These Magic Items cannot be used by other friendly models. Duration: Permanent.

he-shroudSeekers.title: Shroud Seekers
he-shroudSeekers.def: All friendly units gain +1 Defensive Skill and +1 Offensive Skill when in contact with an enemy unit containing a Magic Item.

ong-theOnlyKing.title: The Only King
ong-theOnlyKing.def:
All models in the Only King’s unit benefit from Dying Blow.
In addition, if The Only King is removed as a casualty, all friendly units lose Brood Rivalry. This effect persists for the Duration of One Turn after Amokek is removed as a casualty. This is an exception to the rule 4.C of the “Attacks” chapter: “Losing the Last Health Point”.

ong-bornInFire.title: Born in Fire
ong-bornInFire.def: Amokek gains Resistance(Flaming Attacks). In addition, when Choosing Equipment and Abilities, he may gain Flaming Attacks. Duration: Round of Combat.

ong-theBiggerTheAxe.title: The bigger the Axe…
ong-theBiggerTheAxe.def: Great Weapon. When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, Amokek may choose to gain either Multiple Wounds(2), Hatred. Duration: Round of Combat.

sa-likeTheTyrantsOfOld.title: Like the Tyrants of Old
sa-likeTheTyrantsOfOld.def:
Anurarch Destined is both General and Battle Standard Bearer.
In addition, an Army List containing Anurarch Destined cannot include any other Character, neither the Monolith of Vitalism nor a Koru Stone.

sa-utterlyRuthless.title: Utterly Ruthless
sa-utterlyRuthless.def: The first time each turn Anurarch Destined performs The Sacrifice and inflicts Health Point losses with it, she Recovers 1 HP.

sa-eternityChamber.title: Eternity Chamber
sa-eternityChamber.def: Anurarch Destined gains +2 HP, +3 Arm, and Regeneration(4+).

sa-greaterGuidingMastery.title: Greater Guiding Mastery
sa-greaterGuidingMastery.def: Friendly models containing Magnasaur in units within 12" of Anurarch Destined benefit from Pack Hunter.

ud-theLostAndDamned.title: The Lost and Damned
ud-theLostAndDamned.def:
In an Army List containing Ashotet, Skeleton Warriors and Skeleton Cavalry gain .
In addition, neither of the following unit entries may be included: Death Cult Hierarch, Casket of Phatep, Rehnepeh the Undying Sun, nor any model with Undying Will.

ud-tormentedSouls.title: Tormented Souls
ud-tormentedSouls.def:
The model gains Aegis(5+, against non-Magical Attacks), Exclusive, Ghost Step, Horror, Unruly and Spirit. The model’s Armour is set to 0, it loses Shield, and Skeleton and its value is halved.
All model parts gain +1 AP, Hatred, Magical Attacks, lose all their Weapons, and gain Innate Weapons.

ud-assailedSanity.title: Assailed Sanity
ud-assailedSanity.def:
The Custodian of Souls knows all spells from Evocation and cannot Hereditary Swap.
In addition, once per turn, when she fails a Casting Roll using three or more Magic Dice, she can reroll the dice. If she does, she suffer a Miscast equal to the Casting Roll.

ud-thePyramidion.title: The Pyramidion
ud-thePyramidion.def:
Spells cast by Ashotet gain +6" Range.
In addition, Ashotet can cast a unique Bound Spell(6+):
Surge of Mad Spirits: Range : 24", Type : Hex,Damage, Duration : Instant.

eos-fanaticalDevotion.title: Fanatical Devotion
eos-fanaticalDevotion.def: Models in Brother Tomaz's unit benefit from Regeneration(6+), and model parts without Mount benefit from Hatred.

eos-officiallyNotAMiracle.title: Officially Not A Miracle
eos-officiallyNotAMiracle.def:
Brother Tomaz’s unit Raises 1 HP at the start of each friendly Magic Phase.
Note: Attached models cannot be Raised unless specified.

eos-shepherdingTheFlock.title: Shepherding the Flock
eos-shepherdingTheFlock.def:
Brother Tomaz can join Zealots as if he was Unstable.
As long as he is joined to Zealots, he is Unstable.

dh-wondersOfTheAge.title: Wonders of the Age
dh-wondersOfTheAge.def:
Dinaz Betegoz’s Paired Weapons have the following Runic Enchantments: Rune of Might, Rune of Anger, Rune of Precision.
In addition, Dinaz Betegoz has the following Runic Artefacts: Rune of Denial, Rune of Devouring, Rune of Grounding. This is in addition to the usual limitation of Runic Items, however the Rune of Denial, Rune of Devouring, Rune of Grounding cannot be activated by other friendly models.

dh-theLivingLaw.title: The Living Law
dh-theLivingLaw.def: At the beginning of each friendly Melee Phase, select an enemy unit on your opponent’s Army List. The selected unit becomes marked for the purpose of Ancient Grudge. Duration: Permanent.

se-theUnicornsFury.title: The Unicorn’s Fury
se-theUnicornsFury.def: Hand Weapon. Divine Attacks, Devastating Charge(+1 Str, +1 AP, and +X Att, where “X” is equal to the number of Ranks in a single enemy unit in contact, up to a maximum of 4.)

se-theUnicornsPath.title: The Unicorn’s Path
se-theUnicornsPath.def: One use only. When initiating or ending a Move Manoeuvre in a friendly Movement Phase, Domethloc can change a Water, Ruins, Fields Terrain Feature he is in contact with to a Forest of the same size.

se-thickenedBrush.title: Thickened Brush
se-thickenedBrush.def: One use only. Can be activated at the beginning of the enemy's turn. For each friendly unit within 12" and entirely with Sylvan Spirit, any enemy unit in contact with it loses Devastating Charge. Duration: One Turn.

se-theWorldTree.title: The World Tree
se-theWorldTree.def: Instead of the usual Spell Selection (including Spell Swapping), Dwatobel knows the following spells:Chance of Redemption=free, Veil of Mist=free, Illusory Paths=free, Forest Embrace=free

se-nestOfVipers.title: Nest of Vipers
se-nestOfVipers.def:
Add the following Offensive Profile to Dwatobel:
Viper (6): Att 1, Off 2, Str 2, AP 0, Agi 4, Poison Attacks

se-colonyOfFrogs.title: Colony of Frogs
se-colonyOfFrogs.def:
Add the following Offensive Profile to Dwatobel:
Frog (6): Att 1, Off 2, Str 2, AP 0, Agi 4, Toxic Attacks

se-murderOfCrows.title: Murder of Crows
se-murderOfCrows.def:
Add the following Offensive Profile to Dwatobel:
Crow (6): Att 1, Off 2, Str 2, AP 0, Agi 4, Afflict(-1 Combat Resolution)

ok-youngMercenaries.title: Young Mercenaries
ok-youngMercenaries.def: All friendly Bruiser model parts in an army containing Ganzorig benefit from First Strike(Fury), as long as he is on the Battlefield.

ok-beenThereDoneThat.title: Been There, Done That.
ok-beenThereDoneThat.def: Every friendly unit of Mercenary Veterans and Mercenary Gunners gains Bodyguard(Ganzorig). In addition, Ganzorig benefits from any Extraordinary Model Rule upgrades the unit has.

ok-getTheJobDone.title: Get the Job Done!
ok-getTheJobDone.def: One use only. During 'Calculate Final Combat Score' (Round of Combat, Step 4.B), Ganzorig may Recover up to 2 Health Points and adds +2 Combat Resolution to his side.

bh-standingInWait.title: Standing in Wait
bh-standingInWait.def:
During Pre-game Selections, select either:
  • Attached,
  • Solitary, Sleeper, and Ambush(Field, Forest, Water Terrain).

bh-teachByExample.title: Teach by Example
bh-teachByExample.def:
Any unit containing Ghâá! benefits from Swiftstride, Stubborn, Mindless.
In addition, choose a single Minotaurs unit with a maximum of 5 models. The selected unit gains Ambush(Battlefield Edge), and Ghâá must enter the Battlefield joined to it.

eos-aKoelhundsChase.title: A Koelhund’s Chase
eos-aKoelhundsChase.def: Rolls for Charge Range and Pursue Distance by the model’s unit gain Maximized.

eos-gregorsHolyHammer.title: Gregor’s Holy Hammer
eos-gregorsHolyHammer.def:
Hand Weapon, +1 Str, +1 AP, Multiple Wounds (2, against Aegis or Regeneration*).
*Including against models with Aegis or Regeneration Saves with conditional applications.

eos-divineJurisdiction.title: Divine Jurisdiction
eos-divineJurisdiction.def:
All Inquisitors may give the Steady, Men! Order to their units.
In addition, an Army List containing Heinrich Falkenbach changes the following Orders:
  • Brace For Impact! changes into: Cut the Head of the Snake!:
- The target gains Fury(against units containing a Character), First Strike(Hatred(against Character)).
  • Ready! Aim! Fire! changes into Aim for the Weak Spot!
- If an attack with Aim for the Weak Spot! wounds with a to-wound roll of ‘6’, neither Aegis nor Regeneration Saves can be taken against it.

koe-borrowedSteed.title: “Borrowed” Steed
koe-borrowedSteed.def: Immediately before choosing a unit to join using the Hidden rule, Hernaut may gain a “Destrier” mount for free, without any upgrades.

koe-infuriatingWit.title: Infuriating Wit
koe-infuriatingWit.def: Maximised(Charge Range rolls) towards any unit containing Hernaut.

koe-leprechaunCompanion.title: Leprechaun Companion
koe-leprechaunCompanion.def: Each Standard Melee Attack allocated against Hernaut that misses, is instead allocated to the attacking model’s Health Pool with Automatic Hits.

id-burningArmour.title: Burning Armour
id-burningArmour.def: For each Standard Melee Attack allocated against Ibat-Sokavum that rolls a ‘1’ to-hit, the attacking model’s Health Pool suffers a hit with Str 4, AP 0 and Flaming Attacks.

id-blivetLance.title: Blivet Lance
id-blivetLance.def: Lance. Devastating Charge(+5 Agi). Attacks with the Blivet Lance ignore negative modifiers to to-hit rolls.

id-helmOfKadimCommand.title: Helm of Kadim Command
id-helmOfKadimCommand.def: Model parts with Kadim in friendly units within 12" of Ibat-Sokavum gain First Strike(Hatred(against Weakness(Flaming Attacks))).

koe-newGuard.title: New Guard
koe-newGuard.def:
Dukes cannot be taken in an Army List containing King Henry the Young.
In addition, while joined to a unit of Knights of the Court, King Henry benefits from Devastating Charge(+1 Att, +1 Off, +1 Agi).

koe-aWorthyFoe.title: A Worthy Foe
koe-aWorthyFoe.def: Knightly Principle. During Pre-game Selections, choose a single enemy Character or a single Height 4-5 enemy model with Solitary: King Henry gains Multiple Wounds(10, against the chosen model).

wdg-theFathersGifts.title: The Father’s Gifts
wdg-theFathersGifts.def:
At the beginning of each friendly Player Turn, Klaas can choose a single friendly unit within 12" to gain one of the following abilities, with Duration : One Turn.
  • Supernal Shield: the chosen unit suffers -3 Arm and gains Aegis(5+).
  • Unholy Edge: the chosen unit always strikes at Agility Step 0 and gains +1 AP.
  • The Eight-Point Crown: the chosen unit suffers -1 Str and -1 AP, and gains Unstable, Stubborn.

wdg-memoryOfAHoardedBlade.title: Memory of a Hoarded Blade
wdg-memoryOfAHoardedBlade.def: If included in an Army List not containing Favour of Greed, Klaas gains +2 Str, +2 AP and always strikes at Agility Step 0.

vc-danceOfDeath.title: Dance of Death
vc-danceOfDeath.def:
For every Health Point Lady Chrysélie inflicts with a Standard Melee Attack:
  • Immediately roll another Standard Melee Attack allocated at the same Health Pool as the initial attack.
  • Resolve these attacks before removing any casualties.
  • These new attacks do not generate any further attacks.

vc-thirstyRapiers.title: Thirsty Rapiers
vc-thirstyRapiers.def: Paired Weapons. Lethal Strike. For every Health Point loss dealt with this Weapon, immediately roll a D6: on 5+, Lady Chrysélie Recovers a single Health Point. However, all Vampiric rolls she makes automatically fail.

ong-ironmaulLimb.title: Ironmaul Limb
ong-ironmaulLimb.def: Each time Troll Toll’s effect is triggered, Lerrgog performs two Standard Melee Attacks instead of a single one.

ong-trollsBellow.title: Troll’s Bellow
ong-trollsBellow.def: When you activate the War Cry!, all friendly models with Troll gain Fury. Duration: One Turn.

ong-higherStandards.title: Higher Standards
ong-higherStandards.def: Rank and File units containing Troll in an Army List containing Lerrgog are upgraded with a Standard Bearer. Duration: Permanent. This affects Battle Preparations.

bh-talesOfTheFallen.title: Tales of the Fallen
bh-talesOfTheFallen.def: Moohoarrgh has the following Spell Scrolls:Danse Macabre=free,Umbral Majesty=free,Wild Spikes=free,Dragon’s Roar=free If a friendly Character anywhere on the Battlefield is removed as a casualty or removes an enemy Character as a casualty whilst being Engaged in Combat, select one of Moohoarrgh’s used Spell Scrolls: the selected Scroll can be used again.

wdg-proteanLimbs.title: Protean Limbs
wdg-proteanLimbs.def: Ook gains +D6 Att. Note: roll each time he is about to allocate attacks, as described on p. 45 of the Reference Handbook.

vs-superiorDarkstonePower.title: Superior Darkstone Power
vs-superiorDarkstonePower.def: Professor Mauss can choose not to move despite having Random Movement. In addition, Professor Mauss cannot choose to Pursue, unless he is Charging –– in which case he must Pursue (including Overrun).

vs-inergonInjection.title: Inergon injection!
vs-inergonInjection.def: One use only. In the Movement Phase, before moving, Professor Mauss can gain Random Movement(3D6"). Duration: One Phase.

ud-charioteerOfTheSun.title: Charioteer of the Sun
ud-charioteerOfTheSun.def: During 'Check Combat Formations' (Round of Combat, 2.A), the Rehnepeh model part gains a bonus to its Att, Off, Str, AP, and Agi equal to half the number of Rank-and-File Skeleton Chariot models in his unit, rounding fractions up.

ud-theGoldenChariot.title: The Golden Chariot
ud-theGoldenChariot.def:
Rehnepeh gains +2 HP, Distracting,Rally Around the Flag.
In addition, a unit containing The Golden Chariot can never benefit from Cover.

ud-staffOfPiankhKhahiroth.title: Staff of Pi-Ankh Khahiroth
ud-staffOfPiankhKhahiroth.def: A unit containing the Staff of Pi-Ankh Khahiroth benefits from Ghost Step, Strider. In addition, all attacks made by model parts with Mount benefit from Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks.

sa-harmonyOfTheSun.title: Harmony of the Sun
sa-harmonyOfTheSun.def: All other friendly models in units within 8" of Shade and Stone benefit from Regeneration(+1, max. 4+).

sa-violenceOfTheStorm.title: Violence of the Storm
sa-violenceOfTheStorm.def: The Conjuring Shade model part is always considered affected by Awaken the Beast (Shamanism).

sa-balanceOfNature.title: Balance of Nature
sa-balanceOfNature.def: Wizard Conclave(3). Instead of the usual Spell Selection (including Spell Swapping), Shade and Stone must select one spell from Druidism Apprentice and Adept spells, one spell from Shamanism Apprentice and Adept spells, and must always select the Hereditary Spell.

dh-masterBrewer.title: Master Brewer
dh-masterBrewer.def:
Master Brewer: During each friendly Magic Phase, before Casting Spells ('Magic Phase, Step 5'), the Master Brewer may select a single of the following Ales to affect his unit. Duration: One Turn.
  • Stout Ale: Stubborn, Fearless, Unruly.
  • Bitter Ale: Hatred, Fury, Unruly.
  • Red Ale: Zeal, Lethal Strike, Unruly.

dh-theAlewardCrew.title: The Aleward Crew
dh-theAlewardCrew.def: When Tador Berafrig is Deployed in a unit of Miners, he and all Rank-and-File models in that unit gain +1 Armour and Aegis(3+, against Flaming Attacks). Duration: Permanent.

de-blessedByHarag.title: Blessed by Harag
de-blessedByHarag.def: Techainin’s rags and strange hat never stop dripping, even when out of the water. Aegis(5+),Resistance(against Flaming Attacks).

de-aWateryGrave.title: A Watery Grave
de-aWateryGrave.def:
Techainin is always considered to have rolled a 3+ when rolling for whether he arrives using Ambush.
In addition, at the beginning of “Post Combat” (Step 6 of a Round of Combat), if Techainin won the Round of Combat and an enemy Character in that Combat was removed as a casualty, then Techainin can be placed in Ambush.

de-grimHarpoon.title: Grim Harpoon
de-grimHarpoon.def:
Counts as a Great Weapon in Melee. +1 Att.
Any unit that suffers one or more ranged hits from this weapon loses Swiftstride, and cannot regain it in any way, until the start of the Active Player’s next Turn.

he-rogueHeroine.title: Rogue Heroine
he-rogueHeroine.def: The model gains Fearless, Frenzy, and is unaffected by Rally Around the Flag.

he-scourgeOfFleets.title: Scourge of Fleets
he-scourgeOfFleets.def: Balûruth gains Grind Attack(D6, Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks).

he-theLanceOfTears.title: The Lance of Tears
he-theLanceOfTears.def:
Lance. The model gains Afflict(-1 Dis), Tenacla gains +1 Att and Fury, Hatred.
In addition, she loses 1 Attack at the end of every Game Turn in which she was NOT Engaged in Combat. Duration: Permanent.

dl-revokeTheMandateOfHeaven.title: Revoke the Mandate of Heaven
dl-revokeTheMandateOfHeaven.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of the opponent’s Player Turn. Choose a single enemy unit within 24" of Tergon. The Mobility of all models with Fly in that unit is halved, rounding fractions up. Duration: End of Turn.

dl-commanderOfTheSteppes.title: Commander of the Steppes
dl-commanderOfTheSteppes.def: At the Beginning of 'Moving Vanguarding Units' (Battle Setup, Step 3.F), choose two units within 12" of Tergon entirely with Mount or entirely with Height 2: they gain Vanguard(3")

de-danceOfTheRose.title: Dance of the Rose
de-danceOfTheRose.def:
When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, the Black Rose must choose one of the following Dances, with Duration: Round of Combat. The Black Rose cannot select a specific Dance again until one or more of the following has occurred:
  • She is not Engaged in Combat.
  • She has selected all Dances.
  • She can only select Dance of Caedhren, and it is not possible to do the Make Way.
Dances:
  • Dance of Caedhren: the Black Rose can use Make Way, even if she is already in contact with an enemy model, provided she moves into contact with an enemy Character in her unit’s Front Facing.
  • Dance of Ceinran: Nominate one enemy Character model in contact with the Black Rose. The Black Rose and the selected Character always have 0 Attacks, and no attacks nor hits can be assigned to either. At Agility Step 0, the Black Rose rolls 1D3, Maximized, and the selected Character rolls 1D3. If either model rolls lower, it loses a number of Health Points equal to the difference between the two rolls.
  • Dance of Nabh:
the Black Rose gains Hatred(against Characters),Zeal(against Characters).
Attacks against the Black Rose gain +1 to hit.

de-aembeghensBlades.title: Aembeghen’s Blades
de-aembeghensBlades.def:
Paired Weapons. If there are any enemy Characters in contact with the wielder’s unit, the Black Rose gains +2 Att.
In addition, any Melee Attacks the Black Rose allocates against a Character gain +2 Str, +4 AP.

de-theObsidianThorns.title: The Obsidian Thorns
de-theObsidianThorns.def:
the Black Rose gains Exclusive(Obsidian Guard), Magic Resistance(1), and all models in her unit gain +1 Charge Speed.
In addition, enemy units are not allowed to choose the Flee! Charge Reaction to Charges declared on them by the Black Rose’s unit, unless they are Shaken.
Note: this has no influence on Charge Reactions to other units.

vc-everGrowing.title: Ever Growing
vc-everGrowing.def: Whenever the Collective of Varyag is the target of Arise! (Hereditary Spell), they can Raise Health Points above their number of starting Health Points, to a maximum of twice their starting Health Points.

vc-covenOfSkulls.title: Coven of Skulls
vc-covenOfSkulls.def: When the Collective of Varyag casts Arise! (Hereditary Spell), they may choose to set the spell’s Range to 6" and give it the Type: Aura. This choice is declared when choosing targets.

vs-disorientingScent.title: Disorienting Scent
vs-disorientingScent.def: Afflict(-2 Off), against model parts with Beast, Magnasaur

vs-shadowslicesPanoply.title: Shadowslice’s Panoply
vs-shadowslicesPanoply.def:
The Shadowslice Stalker is equipped with the most advanced selection of murderous weaponry known to any species. Each time the Stalker is Deployed from Ambush or using Hidden, she gains one of the following Magic Items. Duration: Permanent.
  • Countless Daggers: First Strike(+2 Att), Paired Weapons and Throwing Weapons (2+).
  • Darkstone Rod: +2 Str, Lightning Attacks, Multiple Wounds(2)
  • Senator’s Toga: +2 Dis, Commanding Presence(6")

vs-mistressOfSmoke.title: Mistress of Smoke
vs-mistressOfSmoke.def: One use only. When the Shadowslice Stalker would be removed as a casualty or flee while joined to a unit, remove her from the Battlefield: she becomes Hidden again. If she uses this ability and hasn’t been removed as a casualty at the end of the game, the opponent still receives Victory Points as if she had been removed as a casualty.

ong-stillKickin.title: Still Kickin'
ong-stillKickin.def:
At the beginning of any Player Turn when the Splendid Leader is not on the Battlefield (i.e. because he has been removed as a casualty), you can Summon a new Splendid Leader using the Hidden rule, with the following exceptions: you can select whether the new Splendid Leader will be mounted on a Beastie, the Splendid Palanquin or a Beastie Chariot before choosing the unit he appears in.
If the Splendid Palanquin is selected, ignore the Base Size limitation and select six Rank-and-File models in the unit to be joined instead of a single model. After choosing an eligible unit, remove the six Rank-and-File models so that the Splendid Leader is placed in the Front Rank, where the removed models were positioned.

dl-growingDespair.title: Growing Despair
dl-growingDespair.def: Afflict(-1 Dis, -X Def, and -X Off), where 'X' is equal to the number of the current Game Turn.

dl-abandonAllHope.title: Abandon All Hope
dl-abandonAllHope.def: During Tristitia’s Shooting Phase, they can make a Shooting Attack that targets all enemy units within 12" of Tristitia (including those Engaged in Combat and outside Front Arc and/or Line of Sight). Each target suffers 1 hit for each Rank it has, with Strength 9, Armour Penetration 10, Psychic Attacks, Magical Attacks. This attack can be used even if Tristitia is Engaged in Combat.

ok-erusSecretRecipes.title: Eru’s Secret Recipes
ok-erusSecretRecipes.def:
At the start of each friendly Player Turn, pick one of the following to affect the Chefling’s unit. Duration: One Turn.
  • Bluehoove Goat Stew: +2 Mob, Strider
  • Trollbear Goulash: Regeneration(6+), Recover a single HP on a model in the Chefling’s unit.
Note: Attached models cannot be Raised unless specified.
  • Stonecold Soup: Disciplined, Rally Around the Flag(0"), Channel(1)

ok-ghostPepper.title: Ghost Pepper
ok-ghostPepper.def: During each friendly Shooting Phase, select a single model part in the Chefling’s unit: it gains Breath Attack(Str 3, AP 0). Duration: One Phase.

ok-goneButNotForgotten.title: Gone but not Forgotten
ok-goneButNotForgotten.def:
If Valish is removed as a casualty, all friendly model parts with Ogre gain Hatred(against the unit that caused Valish to be removed as a casualty*). Duration: Permanent.
* This includes all models joined to it.

eos-brace_for_impact.title: Brace For Impact!
eos-brace_for_impact.def: The target gains Fight in Extra Rank.

eos-on_the_double.title: On the Double!
eos-on_the_double.def: The target gains +1″ Advance Rate and +4″ March Rate.

eos-steady_men.title: Steady, Men!
eos-steady_men.def: Discipline Tests taken by the target are subject to Minimised Roll. A unit that receives this Order and passes a Rally Test doesn’t become Shaken, and the Reform that is madeafter Rallying doesn’t prevent the unit from moving and/or shooting (but it still counts as having moved for shooting purposes).

eos-holy_relic_aura.title: Holy Relic
eos-holy_relic_aura.def: Friendly units within 6″ of the bearer gain Hatred. Model parts with Harnessed are not affected.

eos-arcane_shield_aura.title: Arcane Shield
eos-arcane_shield_aura.def: Friendly units within 6″ of the model gain Distracting.

eos-foresight_aura.title: Foresight
eos-foresight_aura.def: Friendly units within 6″ of the model gain Lightning Reflexes.

custom-combat_result_bonus.title: Combat Result Bonus
custom-combat_result_bonus.def: Adds X to the Combat Result

se-inside_forest_aura.title: Inside a Forest
se-inside_forest_aura.def: Half of the unit's models have the centre of their bases inside a Forest

se-dance_of_bedevilments.title: Dance of Bedevilments
se-dance_of_bedevilments.def: Fear, and enemy units in base contact with the model do not receive any Rank Bonus to their Combat Score

vc-eternity_gem_aegis.title: Eternity Gem Aegis
vc-eternity_gem_aegis.def: One use only: Must be activated when the bearer's model suffers its first wound in the game after Armour Saves. The bearer’s model gains Aegis (2+) against this wound.

vc-blood_ties_botd.title: Blood Ties (Brotherhood of the Dragon)
vc-blood_ties_botd.def: Devastating Charge (+1 Att) and Plate Armour
